subject: Fwd: Regarding first year result - KYA
snippet: Dear Students, The results have been declared. If you are not satisfied with your grades in any subject, you can apply for Know Your Answer Sheet (KYA) within 3 working days, with the last date to
content:
Dear Students,

The results have been declared. If you are not satisfied with your grades
in any subject, you can apply for *Know Your Answer Sheet (KYA) *within 3
working days, with the last date to apply being *February 3.*

Please note that KYA is only applicable for the Theory University Exam and
not for internal or practical exams.

You can apply for KYA through e-Governance, either on campus or from
outside the campus. *The fee for KYA is ‚Çπ500 per subject*. After applying
for KYA, you will receive a call as well as an email from the exam section
to inform you of the date on which you need to visit with your parents to
review your answer sheet.

Students who wish to apply for KYA and have a backlog must meet me by
tomorrow. Additionally, *Supplementary Exam 1* will be conducted 15 days
after the result declaration.

--

To: <provost@charusat.ac.in>


*Dear Educator,*

Greetings from the *IIT Guwahati, Daksh Gurukul *team.

We are thrilled to inform you that the first phase of the Entrance Test for
the* Credit-Linked program in Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning *has
started. We seek your continued support in informing your students about
this significant opportunity. *This test is open to students regardless of
their degree (tech or non-tech) or year of study.*

*Selection Process:*

   - *Top-performing students* will be offered enrollment into the program.
   - A *waiting list* will be maintained for qualified candidates, who will
   be notified if seats become available.

*Test Details:*

   - *Date:* 2nd February 2025 (Sunday)
   - *Mode:* Online
   - *Registration Deadline:* 30th January 2025
   - *Registration Link: * *https://bit.ly/IITGuwahatiFirstAI
   <https://xbjt7q5k.r.us-east-1.awstrack.me/L0/https:%2F%2Fbit.ly%2FIITGuwahatiFirstAI/1/01000194aa74f12d-0d488bf3-bce1-48d5-b714-a06037606af4-000000/QN1H9jBTd0P3EuBxCHb2hlcnhl8=410>*

 *Click here to register
<https://xbjt7q5k.r.us-east-1.awstrack.me/L0/https:%2F%2Fbit.ly%2FIITGuwahatiFirstAI/2/01000194aa74f12d-0d488bf3-bce1-48d5-b714-a06037606af4-000000/UVu5p1u-LD8ltLUWEOwVoFQEUF8=410>*

*Why the Entrance Test is Important:*
The entrance test assesses fundamental knowledge and *Logical Reasoning*,
providing a fair evaluation for students from all backgrounds. It serves as
an essential step for gaining admission to this highly competitive program,
which includes *hands-on learning*, real-world projects, and personalized
mentorship from *IIT Guwahati *professors and industry experts.

*Curriculum Overview:*
The program provides a comprehensive curriculum that covers all the
essential concepts of *AI and ML with an industry-aligned curriculum.*.

*Key Benefits of the Program:*

   - Earn a prestigious *Certificate from IIT Guwahati *
   - Access to *exclusive career opportunities* and mentorship for tech
   career
   - Build an impressive *portfolio* that demonstrates practical skills

We kindly ask for your support in encouraging your students to register for
the entrance test and take the first step toward a successful career. You
can easily share this information by forwarding this email to your students
or* click here to share on Whatsapp
<https://xbjt7q5k.r.us-east-1.awstrack.me/L0/https:%2F%2Fapi.whatsapp.com%2Fsend%2F%3Ftext=New%2BOpportunity%2BFrom%2BIIT%253A%250A%250AFirst%2BPan-India%2BEntrance%2BTest%2Bfor%2BIIT%2BGuwahati%2527s%2BCredit-Linked%2BAI%2B%2528Artificial%2BIntelligence%2529%2B%2526%2BML%2B%2528Machine%2BLearning%2529%2BProgram.%2B%250A%250AThe%2Btest%2Bis%2Bscheduled%2Bfor%2B%252A2nd%2BFeb%2B2025%2B%2528Sunday%2529%252A%2Band%2Bwill%2Bbe%2Bconducted%2B%252Aonline%252A.%2B%250A%250A%252A%252ARegistration%2Bcloses%2Btoday%253A%252A%2Bhttps%253A%252F%252Fbit.ly%252FIITGuwahatiFirstAI%2B%250A%250AThe%2Btest%2Bevaluates%2B%252Abasic%2Bfoundation%252C%2Breasoning%252C%2Band%2Blogical%2Bskills%252C%2Bmaking%2Bit%2Baccessible%2Bto%2Bstudents%2Bfrom%2B%252A%252Aany%2Bdegree%2Bor%2Bacademic%2Byear%252A%252A.%2BTop%2Bperformers%2Bwill%2Bsecure%2Badmission%2Bto%2Bthe%2Bprogram%252C%2Bwith%2Ba%2B%252A%252Awaiting%2Blist%252A%2Bfor%2Bqualified%2Bcandidates.%250A%250ADon%25E2%2580%2599t%2Bmiss%2Bthis%2Bopportunity%2Bthat%2Bequips%2Bstudents%2Bwith%2B%252Acutting-edge%2Bskills%2Bin%2BAI%252A%25E2%2580%2594register%2Bnow%2521%26type=custom_url%26app_absent=0/1/01000194aa74f12d-0d488bf3-bce1-48d5-b714-a06037606af4-000000/1wWJd7ydJ4jtW4kAq8iHTEVCkFc=410>*

subject: Fwd: Internship Opportunity with Agnirva Space - ISRO Registered Space Tutor
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Provost CHARUSAT <provost@charusat.ac.in> Date: Tue, Jan 28, 2025 at 9:03 AM Subject: Fwd: Internship Opportunity with Agnirva Space - ISRO Registered
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Provost CHARUSAT <provost@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Tue, Jan 28, 2025 at 9:03‚ÄØAM
Subject: Fwd: Internship Opportunity with Agnirva Space - ISRO Registered
Space Tutor
To: Teaching Staff <teachingstaff@charusat.ac.in>



*Dr R.V. Upadhyay,*
*Provost (Vice-Chancellor),*

Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
Off. Nadiad - Petlad Highway, Changa-388421, Gujarat, INDIA
https://charusat.irins.org/profile/156375
c: +91 9427215242 | ph: +91 2697 265015 | e: provost@charusat.ac.in
<registrar@charusat.ac.in> | w: www.charusat.ac.in



---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Amogh Shet <amogh@agnirva.com>
Date: Tue, Jan 28, 2025 at 8:00‚ÄØAM
Subject: Internship Opportunity with Agnirva Space - ISRO Registered Space
Tutor
To: Agnirva Space <space@agnirva.com>


Dear Sir/Madam,

We trust this message finds you well. We are delighted to present a unique
educational advancement for your students through The Agnirva Space
Internship Program
<https://www.agnirva.com/challenge-page/the-agnirva-space-internship-program>
(Free
and Online), Recognized by AICTE and provided by Agnirva.com - an ISRO
Registered
Space Tutor, inaugurated by IN-SPACe.

Please encourage your students to join this free online program
<https://www.agnirva.com/challenge-page/the-agnirva-space-internship-program>.
~ 55,000+ students from esteemed institutions like BITS Pilani, IIM
Bangalore, ISB Hyderabad, IIT Kharagpur, IIT Delhi, IIT Bhu, Delhi
University, LPU, VIT Vellore and 500+ other institutions have already
enrolled. We believe this program can significantly benefit your students
as well.

The Agnirva Space Internship Program
<https://www.agnirva.com/challenge-page/the-agnirva-space-internship-program>
not
only equips students with advanced knowledge in space sciences but also
prepares them for significant future roles across various industries
influenced by space technology. This program offers comprehensive space
content that culminates in a well-deserved certificate.

[image: Aicte Recognised - Agnirva Space Internship Program.jpg]

Regards,

Team Agnirva.com

--

Dear All,



U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering, CSPIT organizes the
following Event in step towards helping people having disabilities or
Physically Challenged.



*Title of the Event:* " CREATIVE PROJECT IDEAS FOR IMPROVING THE LIVES OF
SPECIALLY ABLED PEOPLE "



Guidelines:



1.    Students may submit their creative working project ideas on
a drawing sheet of paper/PPT/PDF.


Submission Link: https://forms.gle/GUHRx6sLvhYPatmx7


These can be further modified on the day of presentation [*15/02/2025*].

2.    Last *Extended Date* of Entry Submission: *8th** February, 2025* [Ideas
through online shared google form]. Each student has to make a separate
entry using the shared google form link.

3.    Students may use a pen, pencil, sketch pen or any other tools
[Computer Software/Hardware] to depict their ideas on the day of
presentation [Date: 15/02/2025, Venue: MAC LAB (601), A7 Building].
Participants must remain present in MAC LAB (601) [A7 Building] from 09:15
am to 12:00 pm on 15/02/2025, Saturday to present their project ideas.
Students may use presentations and poster to demonstrate
their project ideas.

4.    Students may show Project Implementation

5.    Students may submit their ideas in a group of a maximum 3 students.

6.    Best of the THREE Innovative Ideas will be awarded prize money &
certificate *(First prize 1500 Rs/-, Second Prize 1000 Rs/-, Third Prize
500 Rs/-)*. Others will receive a certificate of participation.



*EOC Department Coordinators are requested to encourage students for
participation and please forward this mail to students of your department.*


*For any further query you may please contact student coordinators (**23CE022
- Devam Bhaveshbhai Ghodasara *and *23CE115 - Priya Babubhai Pedhadiya* *).*
Dhaval Bhoi
Assistant Professor,
U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering,
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT, Changa.
Ta-Petlad Dist.Anand
PIN-388421 GUJARAT, INDIA


-- 

*Dr. Kirti Makwana*

Mobile:+91-9586861680

*[image: Inline image 1]                    *
ACCREDITED WITH ‚ÄúA+‚Äù GRADE BY NAAC, GOI

--

subject: [IMPORTANT] IIT CERTIFICATIONS & Industrial Internships For First Year CHARUSAT Students
snippet: DEAR STUDENTS OF CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY Phase - II Warm Greetings! We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with INDIAN INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY (IIT) a
content:
*DEAR STUDENTS*


*OF*

*CHAROTAR UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGYPhase - IIWarm Greetings!*

We are pleased to share an incredible opportunity in partnership with *INDIAN
INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY (IIT)* a *2-Month Training and Internship
Program* featuring
certifications from prestigious leading multinational organizations across
various fields.

*Who Can Apply?*
We invite applications from shortlisted students in all departments. If any
of your classmates haven't received this information, please feel free to
forward this email to them.

*It is Important for Interested Students to submit their application, if
shortlisted you will receive a response from our HR Team:*

Submit your Application <https://forms.gle/Xrob2CDaSfzZ74XAA>




*STUDENTS ENROLLED UNDER SCHOLARSHIP FOR PHASE - I:*
NAME YEAR DOMAIN COLLEGE
Priyanshi Pujara 1ST YEAR ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE Charotar University of
Science and Technology
Khanjan Shah  1ST YEAR DIGITAL MARKETING Charotar University of Science and
Technology
Nitya Khashakiya 2ND YEAR VLSI (VERY LARGE SCALE INTEGRATION) Charotar
University of Science and Technology
Daksh Delawala  1 st Year VLSI (VERY LARGE SCALE INTEGRATION) Charotar
University of Science and Technology
Milind Vinayak Patil  2 st Year ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE Charotar University
of Science and Technology
Roht Eknath Wagh  1 st Year CYBER SECURITY (CISCO VERIFIED
CERTIFICATE) Charotar
University of Science and Technology
Sharvari Pankaj Jadhav  1 st Year GRAPHIC S DESIGN Charotar University of
Science and Technology
Tanishqa Chopade 1 st Year DATA SCIENCE Charotar University of Science and
Technology
*Program Overview:*

*First Month: Training*

   - Participate in live lectures and receive guidance from industry
   professionals.
   - You will receive login details after the Registration Process.

*Second Month: Internship*

   - Engage in real-world projects with professional mentorship.
   - *Project Details:*
      - *Individual Assignments:* Complete 10 unique projects with your
      mentor.
      - *Group Capstone Project:* Collaborate in teams on a capstone
      project, with specific roles assigned to each intern. All necessary
      resources will be provided by the company.

*Class Formats:*

   1. *Blended Learning:*
      - Access recorded sessions and join live doubt-clearing sessions
      every weekend.
   2. *Live Mentor-led Classes:*
      - Attend live Zoom sessions 2-3 times per week after 6:30 PM, with
      recorded sessions available for later review. You will also have
access to
      our Learning Management System (LMS) for six months.

*Certificates and Benefits:*

Upon completion, students will receive:

   - A *Certificate of Completion* in alliance with Kshitij IIT KHARAGPUR
   - Verified certificates through *Wipro Dice ID*.
   - A *Co-branded Internship Certificate* from leading MNCs.
   - *100% Placement Assistance* and entry to a growing professional
   network.
   - Training on *Low-Code and No-Code Tools*.
   - Curriculum focused on *Generative AI and Prompt Engineering*.
   - Exclusive *Masterclasses* with industry leaders.
   - Personalized mentorship for tailored guidance.



*Don‚Äôt miss out on this valuable opportunity!*
*Interested students should submit their applications to be part of this
transformative experience.*


Submit your Application
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvYrnZebeH9i8L6E_AYZP0Ppa7izhxfQZ06E4oDR4SdhTgFQ/viewform?usp=sf_link>



*Best regards,*

*AKASH KAPOOR*
*Senior Academic **Counselor*

subject: Fwd: Online Application for AICTE SSPCA Scheme 2025-26-regarding
snippet: Dear Students, Requesting you to kindly go through the trailing mail. regards, ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: AICTE(no-reply) <noreply6@aicte-india.org> Date: Thu, Jan 16, 2025 at 3
content:
Dear  Students,

Requesting you to kindly go through the trailing mail.

regards,

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: AICTE(no-reply) <noreply6@aicte-india.org>
Date: Thu, Jan 16, 2025 at 3:49‚ÄØPM
Subject: Online Application for AICTE SSPCA Scheme 2025-26-regarding
To: <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Greetings from AICTE New Delhi.

We are happy to inform you *that **SSPCA scheme of AICTE* (Support to
Students for Participating Competition Abroad) provides travel assistance
to a student or a team of students for attending competition at an
international level in order to encourage engineering students to improve
their knowledge in technical education. The SSPCA portal is now open for
applications.

AICTE-approved institutions may now apply for AICTE SSPCA Scheme by
visiting SSPCA portal.

Following link can be clicked for manual for institutions:

*How to fill the application Manual for Institute: *
https://sspca.aicte.gov.in/assets/sample_files/user_manual.pdf

*SSPCA portal link:* https://sspca.aicte.gov.in/

The detailed SSPCA Scheme guidelines are available on AICTE website and
same may be accessed.

*For guidelines:*
https://www.aicte-india.org/sites/default/files/SSPCA_Guidelines.pdf

PFA:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hVrSfZhwB93JXbptDZyANwmMNdZGUC4j/view?usp=sharing


PFA:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1omk6iRsyLOvb6Tl7U99MiANnVxB03w04/view?usp=sharing


*Thanks and Regards*


*Dr.N.H.SiddalingaswamyAdvisor-II (SAG Bureau)All India Council for
Technical Education (AICTE)*
*Nelson Mandela Marg, Vasant Kunj*
*Ministry of Education, Government of India*
*New Delhi-110070*


-- 

*Dr. Kirti Makwana*

Mobile:+91-9586861680

*[image: Inline image 1]                    *

Greetings from AICTE New Delhi.

We are happy to inform you *that **SSPCA scheme of AICTE* (Support to
Students for Participating Competition Abroad) provides travel assistance
to a student or a team of students for attending competition at an
international level in order to encourage engineering students to improve
their knowledge in technical education. The SSPCA portal is now open for
applications.

AICTE-approved institutions may now apply for AICTE SSPCA Scheme by
visiting SSPCA portal.

Following link can be clicked for manual for institutions:

*How to fill the application Manual for Institute: *
https://sspca.aicte.gov.in/assets/sample_files/user_manual.pdf

*SSPCA portal link:* https://sspca.aicte.gov.in/

The detailed SSPCA Scheme guidelines are available on AICTE website and
same may be accessed.

*For guidelines:*
https://www.aicte-india.org/sites/default/files/SSPCA_Guidelines.pdf

Sir/Madam



The Higher and Technical Education Department, in collaboration with CAWACH
Kendra, is delighted to invite students from various
institutes/universities to participate in the Cyber Rakshak Natya Utsav.
This unique initiative aims to raise awareness about cyber fraud prevention
and digital safety through engaging skits and short plays. Flyer of the
event is attached herewith for reference.



*Event Highlights: *

Topic Themes:

   1. Digital Financial Safety
   2. Social Media Awareness
   3. Cybercrime and Prevention
   4. Mental Health and Digital Well-being
   5. Digital Citizenship and Ethical Online Behavior



*Competition Levels and Prizes:*

District-Cluster Level Prizes:

1st Winner: ‚Çπ11,000

2nd Winner: ‚Çπ7,000

3rd Winner: ‚Çπ5,000



State Level Prizes:

1st Winner: ‚Çπ1,00,000

2nd Winner: ‚Çπ71,000

3rd Winner: ‚Çπ51,000



*Key Details*

   - Registration Period: December 30, 2024, to January 25, 2025
   - Eligible Participants: Students from Government and Grant-in-Aid
   Colleges, Gram Vidyapeeths, and State & Private Universities across Gujarat.

*How to Register*

Please nominate a faculty mentor to submit the team registration and skit
concept summary.

*Link for Registration (QR Code is available in the flyer) :*

https://imsva91-ctp.trendmicro.com:443/wis/clicktime/v1/query?url=https%3a%2f%2fdocs.google.com%2fforms%2fd%2fe%2f1FAIpQLSc3OdJOJ4PsTZmL6BYnqKNxT9fCzvZZSfLvbndGim0fsTVQiQ%2fviewform%3fusp%3dheader&umid=72BCD313-2B96-4906-9CC8-B532144EBC06&auth=777990cd74cc620430ea9ccd0417e323e70695df-6095d27a5426c785bcb13b1238aa3415cacbaf6c


For any queries, contact cawach-edu@gujgov.edu.in or call on: 8200743148


Looking forward your institutes's enthusiastic participation in this
meaningful and creative endeavor to promote cyber safety.

You are requested to encourage students for maximum participation in the
event.


*Universities are requested to forward this email to all affliated
institutes. *


Regards,

*Jt. Director (Academic*)

Commissionerate of Technical Education

Block No. 2, 6th Floor,

Karmayogi Bhavan Sector-10-A,

Gandhinagar ‚Äì 382 010. GUJARAT

subject: Fwd: Calling All Student Innovators including incubated start-ups! Apply Now for 2nd edition of the IDE Bootcamp- 2025 (Phase II)
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in> Date: Thu, Jan 9, 2025 at 9:14 AM Subject: Fwd: Calling All Student Innovators including
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, Jan 9, 2025 at 9:14‚ÄØAM
Subject: Fwd: Calling All Student Innovators including incubated start-ups!
Apply Now for 2nd edition of the IDE Bootcamp- 2025 (Phase II)
To: Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Dear All
Good Morning.

Please identify potential students. If required, we can provide them
exclusive training. Please be connected to your HoD in this matter.

Have a wonderful time and best wishes

Bankim Patel

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: AICTE <no-reply@sampark.gov.in>
Date: Thu, Jan 9, 2025 at 4:13‚ÄØAM
Subject: Calling All Student Innovators including incubated start-ups!
Apply Now for 2nd edition of the IDE Bootcamp- 2025 (Phase II)
To: <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Having trouble reading this email? View it in your mobile/ web browser
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/campaigns/2025/06-Jan/AICTE/index.html>
------------------------------

Dear Sir/Madam,

The All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and the Ministry of
Education's Innovation Cell (MIC) successfully organized the first edition
of the ‚ÄúInnovation, Design, and Entrepreneurship (IDE) Bootcamps.‚Äù This
initiative, envisioned by Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi, aims to
nurture the innovation, design, and entrepreneurial skills of student
innovators and innovation ambassadors from higher education institutions We
encourage all higher education institutions to motivate their students to
participate in the IDE Bootcamp and to spread this information within the
student community.

*For glimpses about last year Edition 1 (Phase-I, Phase-II & Phase III) and
Edition 2 Phase I bootcamps, please go through the link below: -*
*https://bootcamp.mic.gov.in/*
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=65f9710bae894ca33b84c7d8c1ad43208425ce0c&lat=2025&mid=1003c30487183e55992ec656f24cb2a36e87a15d>

Now, in the Second Edition of IDE Bootcamp Phase II, AICTE and MIC are
going to be organize 11 Bootcamps at following locations during the period
of *17th February 2025 to 21st February 2025 (**Tentative)*.

*12 cities* are shortlisted *(Tentative)* for conducting the bootcamps as
follows: -

*Sr. No.*

*IDE Bootcamp Phase II Tentative Location*

*1*

Jalandhar (Punjab)

*2*

Jammu and Kashmir

*3*

Agra/Mathura (Uttar Pradesh

*4*

Rajkot/Junagarh/Surat (Gujarat)

*5*

Jabalpur (Madhya Pradesh)

*6*

Patna (Bihar)

*7*

Udaipur (Rajashthan)

*8*

Tezpur/Jorhat (Assam)

*9*

Ranchi/Jamshedpur (Jharkhand)

*10*

Amravati/Guntur (Andhra Pradesh)

*11*

Dindigul (Tamil Nadu)

*12*

Ernakulam (Kerala)



 students and early-stage incubated startups with ground breaking project
ideas to gain the skills and support needed to bring their innovations to
life.

*Who Should **Apply**?*

   - *Students:* If you have an innovative project idea and are enrolled in
   an undergraduate or postgraduate program at a recognized institution, this
   bootcamp is for you.
   - *Incubated Start-ups in academic Institutions:* Applications are
   welcome from early-stage companies that have a distinct innovation emphasis
   and have been nurtured at a local incubation facility. Preferably, a
   prototype or Minimum Viable Product (MVP) is being developed.

*The bootcamp is a 5-day residential training program where student teams
from higher education institutions and startup teams will undergo intensive
experiential learning on design aspects of startups, design thinking,
business modeling, financial planning, and enterprise planning, followed by
mentoring and pitching rounds. Accommodation and meals will be provided to
participants during the IDE Bootcamps.*

*Application** Process:*
Please submit your application through the following link:
https://bootcamp.mic.gov.in/
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=65f9710bae894ca33b84c7d8c1ad43208425ce0c&lat=2025&mid=1003c30487183e55992ec656f24cb2a36e87a15d>

*Last Date to **Apply**:*
15th January 2025, up to 2:30 PM

*For any queries, feel free to **contact** us:*

   - *Email:* idebootcamp@aicte-india.org
   <https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=6612d06dda6b87b34b3808f1d0ded995a50e51ba&lat=2025&mid=1003c30487183e55992ec656f24cb2a36e87a15d>
   , ankush.sharma@aicte-india.org
   <https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=3206e9783dfe33edfe1486dd5fc86b4cbf7ba509&lat=2025&mid=1003c30487183e55992ec656f24cb2a36e87a15d>
   , rc3.mic@aicte-india.org
   <https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=4473ebaf2e1e9270a23584458fba4d36a7d417e1&lat=2025&mid=1003c30487183e55992ec656f24cb2a36e87a15d>
   , aid_mic@aicte-india.org
   <https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=d893611400a5b15acb6249d5c0167c8dea820c46&lat=2025&mid=1003c30487183e55992ec656f24cb2a36e87a15d>
   - *Landline:* 011-29581222, 011-29581223, 011-29581240

Don‚Äôt miss this chance to take your innovation journey to the next level!

*Note: Prospective participants can give 2 location preferences for the
bootcamp. But allocation of the nodal center to the participants (if
selected) will be done as per availability to the nearest location.*

*PFA:- https://drive.google.com/file/d/18-gMBr6HbwPZGkhRS6YG5DL71aD5xFYU/view?usp=sharing
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=46c6f183347de4b691864998b64ff9a1754db787&lat=2025&mid=1003c30487183e55992ec656f24cb2a36e87a15d>
*

*PFA:-https://drive.google.com/file/d/1wyel5x0ZvDoh-kMVmJhP9_Gpye-DqhFI/view?usp=sharing
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/jansampark/click.jsp?tab=pmo&urlid=b2469b3dd10dcb6b89713595406fae60914fd1e9&lat=2025&mid=1003c30487183e55992ec656f24cb2a36e87a15d>
*


*Best Regards,*
*IDE Bootcamp Team*
*MoE‚Äôs Innovation Cell (MIC)*

*Nelson Mandela Marg, Vasant Kunj,**New Delhi-110070*

subject: Appreciation to Lesson Planning Portal Developer - Dhairya Shah (23DCS118) & Priyanshu Valiya (23DCS141)
snippet: Dear Students, We are delighted to share the contributions of our students (Dhairya Shah - 23DCS118 and Priyanshu Valiya - 23DCS141) for the successful completion of Phase -1 of the Lesson Planning (LP
content:
Dear Students,

We are delighted to share the contributions of our students *(Dhairya Shah
- 23DCS118 and Priyanshu Valiya - 23DCS141) *for the successful completion
of Phase -1 of the Lesson Planning (LP) Portal (Web Application) and making
it live for teachers. This platform is designed to streamline academic
processes and objectives, save valuable time, and enable teachers to
efficiently manage lesson planning for their subjects.

The key contributors of this project are as follows:

   - Dhairya Shah (23DCS118) ‚Äì Lead Developer & System Architect
   - Priyanshu Valiya (23DCS141) ‚Äì Next.js Developer
   - Dr. Parth Goel (Coordinator, Teaching Learning Committee) ‚Äì Mentor and
   Testing of a portal

It is worth noting that this significant task was *completed within just
three weeks*, resulting in Phase 1 (Version 1.0) of the portal. Their
efforts have culminated in a user-friendly and efficient platform that will
benefit the entire institution. This accomplishment is a testament to the
hard work and dedication of our students.

*Let us all take a moment to applaud Dhairya and Priyanshu for their
outstanding accomplishment and be inspired by their dedication.*

We would like to acknowledge and express our gratitude to Dr. Amit Nayak
sir (Process Owner - Teaching Learning Committee) and Dr. Bankim Patel sir
(Principal-DEPSTAR) for their continuous support and valuable suggestions
during the portal's implementation.

Thank you for your continuous enthusiasm and support in making such
initiatives successful.

-- 
Regards,
Dr. Parth Goel
Assistant Professor,
Computer Science & Engineering,
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research(DEPSTAR)
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
[*ACCREDITED WITH "A+" GRADE BY NAAC, GOI*],
At. & Post Changa-388421, Ta: Petlad, Dist:Anand, (Gujarat) India.
Ph. No: 02697-265060, Ext. No. : 5297
https://parthgoelblog.wordpress.com/

--

subject: The Quill: CHARUSAT Chronicles | Volume 10 - Issue 1
snippet: Welcome to Quill The Quill: CHARUSAT Chronicles Greetings from CHARUSAT! In the ever-evolving journey of academic excellence and innovation, we are delighted to introduce Quill ‚Äî the official
content:
[Welcome to Quill]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/wx675d1tcad9c/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/a31db465432dd089f9e892e8753dafb6c5467911]


THE QUILL: CHARUSAT CHRONICLES

Greetings from CHARUSAT!

In the ever-evolving journey of academic excellence and innovation, we
are delighted to introduce QUILL ‚Äî the official newsletter of
CHARUSAT. True to its name, Quill embodies the spirit of creativity,
intellect, and expression that defines our vibrant community.

WHAT‚ÄôS INSIDE QUILL?

 	* ACCOLADES: CHARUSAT'S EXCELLENCE ‚Äì Celebrating extraordinary
accomplishments of our students, faculty, and alumni.
 	* RESEARCH PUBLICATIONS: THE EDGE OF EXPLORATION ‚Äì Showcasing
groundbreaking discoveries.
 	* EMINENT SPEAKERS: UNVEILING NEW PERCEPTIONS ‚Äì Dive into engaging
conversations and transformative ideas.
 	* CAMPUS BUZZ: CELEBRATING CAMPUS LIFE ‚Äì Experience the energy and
excitement of campus life.
 	* FACULTY SPOTLIGHT: ACADEMIC EXCELLENCE ‚Äì Highlighting the
brilliance of our faculty.
 	* STUDENT SPOTLIGHT: RISING STARS ‚Äì Inspiring stories of our
student community.

Quill is more than just a newsletter; it is a chronicle of our shared
vision, growth, and success. Join us in celebrating the milestones and
moments that make CHARUSAT a hub of inspiration and innovation.

[Quill Cover Page]
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/wx675d1tcad9c/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/acc0b593868118ea4029db7c89d967632bd3964b]
Read More
[https://mailer.charusat.org.in/index.php/campaigns/wx675d1tcad9c/track-url/ls409tohbwc79/acc0b593868118ea4029db7c89d967632bd3964b]
Warm regards,
THE EDITORIAL TEAM
CHARUSAT

subject: Participation in Interaction Sessions/Counselling in Timetable slots
snippet: Dear Students, I hope this message finds you well. We are excited to announce the commencement of Interaction Sessions, designed to engage you in thought-provoking discussions, skill-building
content:
Dear Students,

I hope this message finds you well.

We are excited to announce the commencement of *Interaction Sessions*,
designed to engage you in thought-provoking discussions, skill-building
activities, and collaborative learning. These sessions will be conducted
during the *Interaction Session/Counselling slots* as per your timetable at
the same Location.

Class Day Time Location
6CSE1 Tuesday 03:20 PM to 04:20 PM 325
6CSE1 Thursday 10:10 AM to 11:10 AM 325
6CSE2 Thursday 10:10 AM to 11:10 AM 324
6CSE2 Thursday 12:10 PM to 01:10 PM 324
4CSE1 Saturday 09:10 AM to 10:10 AM Online
4CSE2 Saturday 09:10 AM to 10:10 AM Online
2CSE1 Tuesday 03:20 PM to 04:20 PM 326
2CSE1 Thursday 12:10 PM to 01:10 PM 326
2CSE1 Friday 10:10 AM to 11:10 AM 326
2CSE1 Friday 03:20 PM to 04:20 PM 326
2CSE2 Wednesday 02:20 PM to 03:20 PM 326
2CSE2 Thursday 03:20 PM to 04:20 PM 325
2CSE2 Friday 03:20 PM to 04:20 PM 325

Your active participation will make these sessions productive and
meaningful. Please come prepared with questions, ideas, and enthusiasm to
contribute to the discussions.

Looking forward to seeing you there!

-- 
*Dipak Ramoliya** /Assistant Professor,*
Department of Computer Science & Engineering, DEPSTAR,
Charotar University of Science & Technology(CHARUSAT)- Changa,
Email: dipakramoliya.ce@charusat.ac.in,
Mo. +91 99987 71587


*            Accredited Grade ‚ÄúA+‚Äù by NAAC, GOI*

--

snippet: Dear Girl Students, Please go through the trailing mail. ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Convener ULSC <convener.ecc@charusat.ac.in> Date: Mon, Dec 23, 2024 at 4:24 PM Subject: Offer
content:
Dear Girl Students,

Please go through the trailing mail.

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Convener ULSC <convener.ecc@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Mon, Dec 23, 2024 at 4:24‚ÄØPM
Subject: Offer for the CHARUSAT Girl Students to watch 31st (2024) Gujarati
Movie for free

>


Dear CHARUSAT Family Members,



Recently a Gujarati movie entitled '*31st (2024)*" has been released in
theatres. The movie is based on a real life incident, which happened to a
girl in Ahmedabad. You can get more information about the film from online
sources.



The producer of the movie has extended the Free Movie Review for *CHARUSAT
Girl Students*. The girl students currently pursuing their studies at
CHARUSAT will get a *free entry in the theatres* after showing her student
I-Card, issued by CHARUSAT, at the ticket counter of the theatre.



Girl students and Lady Faculty members can avail the offer at *Shaan Cinema
‚Äì Anand* and *Lux Cinema - Petlad* till December 28, 2024. The offer is
limited to the scheduled shows of the film. The entry is subject to the
availability of seats. One ticket will be issued for one I-card. The offer
is limited for the film viewing only, other facilities are not the part of
this scheme.



We wish the maximum number of students to avail this offer.



Thank you.




PS: The right of the entry is reserved by the cinema owner.


With regards,
Regards,
Convener/ Co-convener,
ULSC-CHARUSAT.

Ms. Krishna Patel (Ph.D.)

subject: Revolutionizing the Future: The Role of Embedded Systems and IoT in Smart Technologies an IEEE STEP Talk!
snippet: We are excited to invite you to an engaging STEP TALK session, organized by IEEE CSPIT SB in collaboration with the IEEE Gujarat Section. Join us to explore the transformative potential of Embedded
content:
We are excited to invite you to an engaging STEP TALK session,
organized by *IEEE
CSPIT SB* in collaboration with the *IEEE Gujarat Section*. Join us to
explore the transformative potential of Embedded Systems and IoT in driving
smart technologies.


*Event Details:*

‚Ä¢ *Topic:* Revolutionizing the Future: The Role of Embedded Systems and IoT
in Smart Technologies

‚Ä¢ *Speaker:* Dr. Rutu Parekh, Associate Professor at DA-IICT

‚Ä¢ *Date:* Friday, 27 December

‚Ä¢ *Time:* 12:10 PM - 2:10 PM

‚Ä¢ *Venue:* A6 EC/EE Building, Seminar Hall (2nd Floor)


*Session Highlights:*

‚Ä¢ Introduction to Embedded Systems and IoT: Definitions, key concepts, and
evolution.

‚Ä¢ Key Components: Microcontrollers, sensors, actuators, and IoT platforms.

‚Ä¢ Emerging Applications: Smart homes, IIoT, healthcare, and environmental
monitoring.

‚Ä¢ Design Challenges: Low-power designs, real-time performance, security,
and scalability.

‚Ä¢ Role of AI: Enhancing IoT functionalities through AI and case studies.

‚Ä¢ Future Trends: 5G, edge computing, and sustainable IoT technologies.



*About the Speaker:*

*Dr. Rutu Parekh* has extensive expertise in Micro/Nanoelectronics,
Embedded Systems, and IoT. With academic achievements from Concordia
University, Universit√© de Sherbrooke, and IIT Bombay, she has contributed
significantly to military and space application research. She is a
published author, a technical advisor, and the founder and chair of the
IEEE NTC Chapter.


We encourage you to attend this insightful session and engage with a leader
in the field.


*Fill out the google form to book your seat :*

https://forms.gle/k47fR279xJtD2vtn9


Looking forward to your presence!

IEEE CSPIT Student Branch
[image: newlogoieee.png]

content:

From: Provost CHARUSAT <provost@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, Dec 18, 2024 at 8:46‚ÄØAM
Subject: Fwd: Invitation to Join Hackathon Event Organized by IIT Kanpur
To: Teaching Staff <teachingstaff@charusat.ac.in>



*Dr R.V. Upadhyay,*
*Provost (Vice-Chancellor),*

Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)
Off. Nadiad - Petlad Highway, Changa-388421, Gujarat, INDIA
https://charusat.irins.org/profile/156375
c: +91 9427215242 | ph: +91 2697 265015 | e: provost@charusat.ac.in
<registrar@charusat.ac.in> | w: www.charusat.ac.in



---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: President, AIU <president@aiu.ac.in>
Date: Mon, Dec 16, 2024 at 5:26‚ÄØPM
Subject: Invitation to Join Hackathon Event Organized by IIT Kanpur
To: <provost@charusat.ac.in>


*Invitation to Join Hackathon Event Organized by IIT Kanpur*


Dear Vice Chancellor/ Director


*Greetings from the Association of Indian Universities (AIU).*


I am delighted to extend an invitation to your esteemed university to
participate in the upcoming Hackathon Event organized by IIT Kanpur. As
India's leading cybersecurity innovation hub, C3iHub, IIT Kanpur aims to
nurture talent and drive innovation by tackling real-world cybersecurity
challenges. This hackathon offers an exciting platform for students and
researchers to engage with industry experts, showcase their skills, and
contribute to solving critical cybersecurity issues.


I would like to invite your esteemed university to encourage participation
through your students and alumni in the cybersecurity challenges.

For more details, please visit the event website at
https://hackathon.iitk.ac.in
<https://754s0.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/6rqJfgq8dINmNjUh0N2jnWjHZVU/Dctd-RS46UWc>



*The main goal of this hackathon is to raise awareness about cybersecurity
among young people.*



*Expectations from Universities:*

*Promotional Support:*

Sharing event details with students and faculty through internal
communication channels.

Prominent display of hackathon materials on campus and social platforms.

*Participation:*

Encouraging active participation from your student community.

Facilitating faculty involvement in hackathon activities.

*Benefits for Participants:*

Hackathon challenges will resemble real-world scenarios, allowing
participants to develop expertise as they progress through them.

Participants will learn how to stay cyber-safe against modern cyberattacks
and crimes.

Hackathon winners will receive cash awards, cloud credits, and
opportunities for internships or jobs with C3iHub.

Hackathon winners will also get startup incubation opportunities with SIIC
at IIT Kanpur under the guidance of C3iHub.


We believe that your university's participation will significantly
contribute to the success of this event, while also providing valuable
learning and growth opportunities for your students and faculty.


I appreciate your support and we look forward to your active participation.


Warm regards,

Prof. Vinay Kumar Pathak
President, Association of Indian Universities, New Delhi
& VC, CSJM University, Kanpur












If you wish to unsubscribe from our newsletter, click here
<https://754s0.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/un/sh/6rqJ8GqndAnmOikGXMZb5HXO1HY/JzW1iBJcMpFW>


-- 

*Dr. Kirti Makwana*

Mobile:+91-9586861680

*[image: Inline image 1]                    *
ACCREDITED WITH ‚ÄúA+‚Äù GRADE BY NAAC, GOI

--

subject: Speaking topics University Practical Exam CSE SEM 1 DIV 2 DEPSTAR for the course HSUA101
snippet: Dear students of CSE DIV 2 SEM 1 DEPSTAR As your university practical examination of CSE SEM 1 DIV 2 DEPSTAR for the subject HSUA101: Communicative English is scheduled for Thursday, December 19, 2024.
content:
Dear students of *CSE DIV 2 SEM 1 *DEPSTAR

As your *university practical examination of CSE **SEM 1 DIV 2 DEPSTAR for
the subject HSUA101: Communicative English* is scheduled for Thursday,
December 19*, 2024. *Please review the components and instructions for the
examination below:
Examination Components:

   1. *Quiz*: 40 Marks (*to be conducted in class from 9:20 am to 10
am*) *Reporting
   time is 9:10 am*
   2. *Viva Voce*: 30 Marks  (10:10 am onwards) in the parallel track
   3. *Speaking *: 30 Marks (10:10 am onwards) in the parallel track

*Speaking topics (ID number-wise) are shared with you in the attachment
below. Do find your topic for speaking and prepare accordingly.*
Important Instructions:

   - Formal attire is mandatory.
   - Please bring your *university ID* card and *Hall Ticket,* as they are
   required for the Viva Voce.
   - Refer to all the study material, the topic-wise sample question bank,
   and the practice exercises already shared in the Google Classroom of DCSE
   SEM 1 Div 2 for the preparation for the exam.
   - The venue for the examination (quiz) is *room no. 325*

We wish you the best in your preparation. Kindly ensure adherence to all
instructions.
Regards
*Ms. Jayshree Mehta *
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Humanities & Social Sciences*
*Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of Management*
*CHARUSAT University, Changa, India.*
*Accredited with "Grade A+" by NAAC*
*Ext. No. 5135*
*Contact: 7600147568 <7600147568>*

--

encourage them to participate.
___

Dear All,
Energy Conservation Cell-CHARUSAT has organized a hand-drawn poster-making
competition for students and staff of CHARUSAT on the occasion of "National
Energy Conservation Day-14th December 2024."

The theme of the poster is "Innovations in Energy Saving."  The participant
has to submit an *A3 size hand-drawn pencil sketch poster *to the Head,
Electrical Engineering Department, CSPIT (Room No. 136, A6 Building,
CAPIT) before 6 January 2025, 04.30 pm.

First Three winners will be awarded prize money.
No Entry Fee.
For more details, contact: Head, Electrical Engineering Dept., CSPIT.

Regards,
____

Dr. Nilaykumar A. Patel

Electrical Engineering Dept.
Chandubhai S. Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT,
Changa. 388421

subject: University Practical Exam CSE SEM 1 DIV 2 DEPSTAR for the course HSUA101
snippet: Dear Students, This is to inform you that your university practical examination of CSE SEM 1 DIV 2 DEPSTAR for the subject HSUA101: Communicative English is scheduled for Thursday, December 19, 2024.
content:
Dear Students,

This is to inform you that your *university practical examination of CSE **SEM
1 DIV 2 DEPSTAR for the subject HSUA101: Communicative English* is
scheduled for Thursday, December 19*, 2024.  *Please review the components
and instructions for the examination below:
Examination Components:

   1. *Quiz*: 40 Marks (to be conducted in class)
   2. *Viva Voce*: 30 Marks
   3. *Speaking *: 30 Marks

*Speaking topics (ID number-wise) will be shared with you a day prior to
the exam.*
Important Instructions:

   - Formal attire is mandatory.
   - Please bring your *university ID* card and *Hall Ticket,* as they are
   required for the Viva Voce.
   - Refer to all the study material, the topic-wise sample question bank,
   and the practice exercises already shared in the Google Classroom of DCSE
   SEM 1 Div 2 for the preparation for the exam.
   - The venue for the examination (quiz) is *room no. 325*

We wish you the best in your preparation. Kindly ensure adherence to all
instructions.
Regards
*Ms. Jayshree Mehta *
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Humanities & Social Sciences*
*Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of Management*
*CHARUSAT University, Changa, India.*
*Accredited with "Grade A+" by NAAC*
*Ext. No. 5135*
*Contact: 7600147568 <7600147568>*
ReplyReply allForward

--

subject: Seating Arrangement of External Exam of B. Tech. - SEM 1, DEPSTAR.(2024-25).
snippet: Dear students, Kindly find the seating arrangement in the attached pdf file. Kindly go through the following guidelines for the upcoming university theory examination. ¬∑ Students are required to adhere
content:
Dear students,



*Kindly find the seating arrangement in the attached pdf file. *


Kindly go through the following  *guidelines for the upcoming university
theory examination*.



¬∑   *Students are required to adhere to the seating arrangement outlined in
the email attachment. *

¬∑    *Students are required to uphold decorum in the examination
hall. Mobile phones, smartwatches, or any other electronic devices are
strictly prohibited within the exam hall. *

¬∑    *Bags must be left outside, and it is mandatory to wear an ID card.
Students have to take their seat in the exam hall at least 15 minute prior
to the exam time.*

¬∑   *The exam will take place in IIIM Building. *

¬∑    *All students are required to enter the campus through the Karoli
Gate and follow the signboards to reach the Multi-Utility Building.*



*All the best for your exam.*
Thanks & Regards,
Naina Parmar,
Assistant Professor,
Computer Science & Engineering Department,
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)
Changa-Gujarat 388421

--

snippet: Hello Everyone, As you all know SPOURAL'25 is going to start from 6th January 2025; hence, for sports and cultural registration, kindly fill out the form below. This is an opportunity to showcase
content:
Hello Everyone,

As you all know SPOURAL'25 is going to start from 6th January 2025; hence,
for sports and cultural registration, kindly fill out the form below. This
is an opportunity to showcase your talent and represent your department at
the university level.
*Let‚Äôs come together to showcase the excellence of DEPSTAR CSE.*

Interested participants are requested to fill out the form. We look forward
to maximum participation.

Sports Participation:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/16mDXYgVds7KfqmpTJ2dQ5AaLQLvB2dL96en-gN33QKI

Cultural Participation:

Cultural Coordinator:

Detailed Schedule for Selection Slots after registration will be
communicated soon.

*The form will be closed on 08/12/2023 at 6:00 PM.*

Spoural Sports and cultural events include games for both boys and girls.

Attendance will not be given at the time of selection.

subject: Calling All Young Leaders: Join the Viksit Bharat Young Leaders Dialogue 2025!
snippet: Dear Students, Are you ready to shape the future of India? The Viksit Bharat Young Leaders Dialogue (VBYLD) 2025 is here to empower youth like you to lead the charge toward a Viksit Bharat! This
content:
Dear Students,

Are you ready to shape the future of India? The *Viksit Bharat Young
Leaders Dialogue (VBYLD) 2025* is here to empower youth like you to lead
the charge toward a *Viksit Bharat*!

This exciting initiative, part of the *National Youth Festival (NYF) 2025*,
offers a platform to showcase your talent, share your vision, and connect
with decision-makers and global icons.
Why Should You Participate?

   - *Showcase Your Ideas:* Take part in engaging activities like quizzes,
   essays, and pitch presentations.
   - *Make an Impact:* Present your vision directly to the *Hon‚Äôble Prime
   Minister* and other eminent leaders.
   - *Gain Recognition:* Earn appreciation letters, certificates, and a
   chance to represent your state and nation.
   - *Learn and Explore:* Dive into exhibitions, cultural events, and
   interactive sessions designed to celebrate India‚Äôs heritage and progress.

How to Get Started

   1. *Step 1:* *Register for the Viksit Bharat Quiz* (November
   25th‚ÄìDecember 5th, 2024) on the *My Bharat Portal*.
   <https://mybharat.gov.in/>
   2. *Step 2:* Advance to the *Essay/Blog Competition* (December
   8th‚ÄìDecember 12th, 2024).
   3. *Step 3:* Compete in the *State and National Vision Deck
   Championships* during NYF 2025.

Themes to Explore

   - *Empowering Youth for Viksit Bharat*
   - *Making India the Global Manufacturing Powerhouse*
   - *Enhancing Productivity in Agriculture*
   - *Building Infrastructure for the Future*
   - And many more!

This is your moment to shine, inspire change, and contribute to India‚Äôs
future. We‚Äôre looking for passionate, innovative, and visionary young
minds‚Äîjust like you!

Ready to take the challenge? *Register now and be part of the movement!*

For any questions or more information, please contact me at
*jaypatel.dce@charusat.ac.in
<jaypatel.dce@charusat.ac.in>* or *(M): +91 94281 53390.*

Let‚Äôs create a brighter future together.
*Best regards,*
*Mr. Jay Patel,*
*Assistant Professor,*
*University-Level Central Students Council**,*
*Department of Computer Engineering,*
*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)*
*(M) +919428153390*
*LinkedIn: *www.linkedin.com/in/jrbpatel

*Stay healthy and fit.*
  *Please don't print this e-mail unless you really need to.*

--

content:

This email is strictly for marks correction purposes. *No retests, quizzes,
or exams will be conducted by the faculty*. If you have concerns about your
marks, inform me immediately. Please note that the deadlines for unit
tests, assignments and quizzes have already passed.

subject: Improve your coding skills with 30 Days of Code
snippet: Improve your coding skills with 30 Days of Code Hi Priyanshi, Ready to become a better coder? Practicing for a programming job interview? Join thousands of other HackerRank members who are learning to
content:
30 Days of Code

|

|

|

subject: Final Marks Notification (Out of 50)
snippet: Dear Students, This is to inform you that your final marks (out of 50) have been updated. Please carefully recheck the sheets provided. Important Notes: Students highlighted in red have either not
content:
Dear Students,

This is to inform you that your final marks (out of 50) have been updated.
Please carefully recheck the sheets provided.

*Important Notes:*

   - Students highlighted in *red* have either not submitted their
   assignments or missed the unit test or quiz.
   - If you have any concerns or find discrepancies, please inform me
   immediately.

*Kindly note:*

   - Any concerns regarding the marks *must be raised now*.
   - After this, no further queries or concerns, including those related to
   human error, will be considered.
   -   The *passing marks* for the internal exam are 18 out of 50.

Thank you for your cooperation.
*Dr. Bina Patel*
*Assistant Professor*

subject: Fwd: "Level Up Your Startup Journey ‚Äì Join CIVF Acceleration 2.0 Today!"
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Registrar CHARUSAT <registrar@charusat.ac.in> Date: Mon, Nov 25, 2024 at 2:32 PM Subject: "Level Up Your Startup Journey ‚Äì Join CIVF Acceleration
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Registrar CHARUSAT <registrar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Mon, Nov 25, 2024 at 2:32‚ÄØPM
Subject: "Level Up Your Startup Journey ‚Äì Join CIVF Acceleration 2.0 Today!"
To: Charusat Family <charusatfamily@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Charusat Family,

Kindly forward the email below to your acquaintances (students, alumni,
friends, and family) who might benefit from the Government of Gujarat's
schemes to accelerate their Start-up.

We truly appreciate your continued involvement and support.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

üöÄ *Calling All Start-up Founders!*

Charusat Innovative Ventures Foundation (CIVF), recognized as a *Nodal
Institute* by the *Industries Commissionerate, Govt. of Gujarat*, is here
to supercharge your entrepreneurial journey!

üåü *What We Offer: *An opportunity to apply for -

üí∞ Seed support of up to *‚Çπ30 lakhs* for innovative startups as Grant and
Equity investment of *‚Çπ**1.25 Cr. *

üíº Sustenance allowance: ‚Çπ20,000/month for men-led startups & ‚Çπ25,000/month
for *women-led startups* (for 1 year).
üí° Additional support of *‚Çπ10 lakhs* for startups creating a *significant
societal impact* (total seed support up to ‚Çπ40 lakhs).
üõ†Ô∏è Training assistance: Up to *‚Çπ1 lakh per startup* for soft skills
reimbursement.
üåç Acceleration program funding: Up to *‚Çπ3 lakhs* for
national/international programs.
üìà MSME support: *1% interest subsidy* on term loans (up to 9%).


üåê *Why Choose CIVF?*
We‚Äôre an accelerator backed by a robust network of *Industrial Mentors*, *Angel
Investors*, and *VC firms*.

   - *CIVF Acceleration Program 1.0* highlights:
   ‚úÖ 32 start-ups admitted
   ‚úÖ 20+ investor calls
   ‚úÖ 120+ mentorship sessions
   ‚úÖ Recruitment drives, exhibitions, award ceremonies, and more!


‚úÖ *If you are already associated with CIVF*, kindly complete the *Seed
Support Form* üìÑ [refer to *Annexure-1*, Pages *9-12*, Points *2.3, 2.4,
and 2.5*].

üöÄ *If you are not yet associated with CIVF*, we invite you to join
our *Acceleration
Program 2.0* üåü. Upon successful completion of the program, you will become
eligible to apply for *seed funding of ‚Çπ30-40 lakhs* üí∞, as outlined
in the *Industries
Commissionerate Guidelines* üìú [refer to *Annexure-1*, Page *5*, Point *2.1*,
Sub-point *8*].

üéØ *Join the CIVF Acceleration Program 2.0! *
Be part of *Cohort 2.0*, designed to scale your startup and deliver
tangible outcomes. (Find the Brochure attached as Ann-2)

üëâ *Apply Now:* Fill out the form here
<https://civf.co.in/acceleration-program#form>.

üåê *Learn More:* Visit our website <https://civf.co.in/>.
*Also Note the Deadline is extended till 30th Nov, 2024 4:30 PM. *


Regards,


*Dr. Atul Patel*

*Registrar*


Accredited Grade ‚ÄúA+‚Äù by NAAC

www.charusat.ac.in





-- 

*Dr. Kirti Makwana*

Mobile:+91-9586861680

*[image: Inline image 1]                    *
ACCREDITED WITH ‚ÄúA+‚Äù GRADE BY NAAC, GOI

subject: Announcement: SPOURAL'25 - A Celebration of Sports and Cultural!
snippet: Greetings from the University Level Central Student Council! We are thrilled to announce that *SPOURAL'25*, our much-anticipated annual sports and cultural extravaganza, will take place from *6th
content:
Greetings from the University Level Central Student Council!



We are thrilled to announce that *SPOURAL'25*, our much-anticipated annual
sports and cultural extravaganza, will take place from **6th January to
31st January 2025*.* Mark your calendars for a month of energy, enthusiasm,
and excellence!



Event Schedule:



**Sports Competitions: 6th January to 28th January,2025**



**Cultural Events: 29th January to 31st January,2025**



This year, we are excited to expand our sports categories with the
*addition of Handball and Ultimate Frisbee* for students and Chess and
Table Tennis for Faculty, bringing fresh opportunities for athletes to
shine. With these new additions, *SPOURAL'25 promises to be bigger and
better than ever!*



**Important Note:**



This is a general announcement for all Institutes/Departments. We encourage
you to start your team selection and gear up for the exciting competitions
ahead. Let‚Äôs showcase our collective talent, teamwork, and enthusiasm!



Stay tuned for further details regarding registrations, event line-ups, and
schedules. Together, let‚Äôs make SPOURAL'25 an unforgettable celebration of
sportsmanship and culture.





Warm regards,


*Convener,*


*University Level Central Students Council (ULSC).*

*CHARUSAT.*

--

or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or
privileged material which is the intellectual property of Charotar 
University
of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT). Any review, retransmission,
dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon 
this

if you have received this in error, please contact the

and/or viruses/Trojan horses

or part thereof this message, and
taking action thereof, the recipient 
relieves the CHARUSAT of all the
liabilities including any damages done to 
the recipient's pc/laptop/peripherals
and other communication devices due 
to any reason.

subject: Re: Congratulations on Being Selected for the University Cultural Team!
snippet: Congratulations to all the selected participants. Best regards, Mr. Jay Patel, Assistant Professor, University-Level Central Students Council, Department of Computer Engineering, Devang Patel Institute
content:
Congratulations to all the selected participants.

*Best regards,*
*Mr. Jay Patel,*
*Assistant Professor,*
*University-Level Central Students Council**,*
*Department of Computer Engineering,*
*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)*
*(M) +919428153390*
*LinkedIn: *www.linkedin.com/in/jrbpatel

*Stay healthy and fit.*
  *Please don't print this e-mail unless you really need to.*


On Tue, Nov 19, 2024 at 11:26‚ÄØPM SANA SEDAT <22bsmt021@charusat.edu.in>
wrote:

> Dear Participants,
>
> We are excited to inform you that you have been selected to be a part of
> the University Cultural Team!  Your talent and enthusiasm stood out, and we
> are thrilled to have you on board.
>
>
>
> *To stay updated on upcoming meetings, rehearsals, and team activities,

content:

the University Cultural Team!  Your talent and enthusiasm stood out, and we

Student coordinator

Inter University Youth Festival 2024-25 - Fine Arts & Literary Events
Here's what was received.

Edit response


CHARUSAT Team Selection for All India/West Zone Inter University Youth  
Festival 2024-25 - Fine Arts & Literary Events


The CHARUSAT University Cultural Team is proud to represent the university  
in Fine Arts and Literary events at the All India/West Zone Inter  
University Youth Festival. This team is a space for talented students to  
showcase their skills in visual and literary arts, express their  
creativity, and engage in cultural exchange. Being part of the team offers  
students the opportunity to enhance their abilities, gain exposure, and  
join a community that celebrates artistic and intellectual pursuits.

Once registered, details about the selection process will be shared.

Fine Arts Events Include:


On-the-Spot Painting
Collage
Poster Making
Clay Modelling
Cartooning
Rangoli
Spot Photography

Mehendi

subject: Syllabus of MSUD101 for MIDTERM Exam
snippet: Dear Students Pls note that the institute will conduct an exam of MSUD101 on 18/11/2024 for the late admitted students and for those students who remain absent in the Midterm exam conducted in the
content:
Dear Students
Pls note that the institute will conduct an exam of MSUD101 on 18/11/2024
for the late admitted students and for those students who remain absent in
the Midterm exam conducted in the month of September. The paper style and
Syllabus of the exam is as follows:
Paper Style
05 MCQ +15 Marks Discreptive questions
Syllabus:
Unit 1 : Higher order derivative
Unit 2 : Infinite series *( Infinite series * *only* *and Complex number is
not included in the exam)*
Unit 3 : Matrix
Unit 4: Partial differentiation
BEST OF LUCK ....

If you have any queries, then consult me in the staff room 309, 2nd floor,
Ec Ee building.

*Thanks and regards,*
*Rajesh V. Savalia *
*PhD, MPhil*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Mathematical Sciences*
*P. D. Patel Institute of Applied **Sciences*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology*
*Accredited Grade 'A+' by NAAC *
*Website: https://www.charusat.ac.in/ <https://www.charusat.ac.in/>*
*M. No. 94292 22899*

--

subject: IMPORTANT, ODD SEM]IIT-MNC CERTIFICATIONS & AICTE Approved Industrial Internships For CHARUSAT Students
snippet: Dear Student We extend a warm invitation for you to participate in the COGNIZANCE (IIT ROORKEE) Industrial Learning and Internship opportunities. To know more about you, we request to kindly fill up
content:
Dear Student

We extend a warm invitation for you to participate in the *COGNIZANCE (IIT
ROORKEE)* *Industrial Learning and Internship opportunities*.



*To know more about you, we request to kindly fill up the application form.*
*https://forms.gle/xu44E5NhjdV3TSmq6 <https://forms.gle/xu44E5NhjdV3TSmq6>*
*Application Form:*

*(FIRST COME FIRST SERVE BASIS)*

*JOIN OUR OFFICIAL WHATSAPP GROUP*
*https://chat.whatsapp.com/IKG0FQjjnSm5Azy2Yaoa9j*
<https://chat.whatsapp.com/IKG0FQjjnSm5Azy2Yaoa9j>

*Here's a brief overview of what the program entails:*
Duration:*2-3 Months*
Mode: *REMOTE*


‚öôÔ∏è *First month(Industrial Training program):-* Comprehensive training
program led by industry professionals with 10+ years of experience,
Hands-on projects with 10+ live projects, covering 25-30 modules and over
80 hours of content.

‚öôÔ∏è *Second month(Industrial Projects):-*  Practical experience with the
capstone project, accompanied by mentorship from an experienced
professional from the partnering MNC.

*Project 1:- 1 Individual projects* are assigned to each intern, which they
must complete with their mentor.

*Project 2:- Capstone Project:* A group project assigned to 15 interns. For
each intern particular work will be assigned to them, and they have to work
on it.


*(Essential data and materials required for the project will be provided by
the company side itself)*And also You'll be having a Mentor from the same
MNC, he'll be guiding you in each and every moment of your Internship
period.

*After Completion of the program, the student will receive the:*





*‚úÖ Program Completion Certificate issued by  COGNIZANCE IIT
ROORKEE‚úÖ Co-Branded Internship Certificate from MNC's and
Startup's.‚úÖ Letter of Recommendation from MNCs.‚úÖ Access to a Growing
Community.  ‚úÖ Microsoft Certification Examination Training.*




*Best Regards,TeachnookCOGNIZANCE (IIT ROORKEE)*

subject: CHARUSAT - FMS - IIIM - Invitation @ Prabandhan 2024 (Exhibition cum Sale) - Inaugural Ceremony
snippet: Dear All, Greetings! We are thrilled to inform you that Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of Management (IIIM) is organising PRABANDHAN ‚Äì 2024 from October 25 to 28, 2024 (10:00 AM to 09:00 PM). Prabandhan
content:
Dear All,



Greetings!



We are thrilled to inform you that Indukaka Ipcowala Institute of
Management (IIIM) is organising *PRABANDHAN ‚Äì 2024 *from October 25 to 28,
2024 (10:00 AM to 09:00 PM).


Prabandhan is a student-driven event in which students work in close
collaboration with industries, entrepreneurs, gruh-udhyog, and SMEs to
understand the product, devise marketing strategies, learn financial
management and negotiation skills, and ultimately sell the product.


You are invited to visit the exhibition with your family, friends, and
relatives to motivate the student participants.




The inaugural ceremony details are as follows:



*Chief Guest: Anitaben Patel & Aartiben Patel (IPCO Parivar)*

*Place: Sardar Patel Banquet Hall, Anand (Opp. D Z Patel High School, 80
Feet Road, Anand)*

*Date: October 25, 2024 (Friday)*

*Timing: 10:00 AM*



*Please find the attached invitation and product poster herewith this mail.*


*Hoping to see you all at Prabandhan 2024 during all the four days of the
event (October 25-28, 2024).*



*Regards,*



*TEAM PRABANDHAN - IIIM*

--

Dear Secretaries/Directors (Higher & Technical Education)

(All States/UTs in the country)

Greetings from AICTE!

As you know, Yuva Sangam is a key initiative under the Ek Bharat Shreshtha
Bharat (EBSB) program, launched by the Hon'ble Prime Minister of India.
This flagship program facilitates exposure tours for youth primarily
students from Higher Educational Institutions (HEIs) to experience diverse
cultures and achievements across different states. Through these exchanges,
we aim to foster national integration and understanding among young people.

Yuva Sangam not only emphasizes cultural exchange but also includes
activities designed to enhance leadership, sports, and soft skills.
Participants will engage in workshops on communication and teamwork, take
part in sports events organized by SAI, and have the chance to interact
with VVIPs and notable personalities from the host state.

The success of previous Yuva Sangam phases underscores the vital role of
youth in building connections across communities. This initiative has
positively impacted the lives of thousands, contributing to a more united
and inclusive India.

I request you to kindly direct *all institutions* imparting higher and
technical education (UG, PG, doctoral etc.) under your State/UT to advise
and motivate their students to register for Yuva Sangam Phase-5, an
enriching student exchange program under EBSB.

Registration is open from *October 10, 2024* to *October 21, 2024* and can
be completed online at https://ebsb.aicte-india.org/.

Please find attached a document with strategies to inspire student
registrations for Yuva Sangam.

Thank you for your support.

date: Dear Students, We are excited to invite you to participate in the selection process for the CHARUSAT team at the upcoming All India/West Zone Inter University Youth Festival 2024-25. This festival is a
labelIds:
Dear Students,

We are excited to invite you to participate in the selection process for
the CHARUSAT team at the upcoming All India/West Zone Inter University
Youth Festival 2024-25. This festival is a prestigious platform where you
can showcase your talents and represent our university on a national level.

*Benefits of Participation:*

- Recognition and Exposure: Gain visibility and recognition for your
talents.

- Skill Development: Enhance your leadership, teamwork, and creative skills.

- National-Level Opportunities: The chance to represent CHARUSAT at
national youth festivals.

- Networking: Build connections with peers across universities.

*Important Details:*

*- Registration Form: *https://forms.gle/C1VFdPTgfucvzUHKA

*- Deadline for Registration:* 1st November, 2024

*- Guidelines, Rules, and Regulations*: Please review the attached
documents carefully for event details and required documents.

We encourage all students to take advantage of this opportunity to grow and
make CHARUSAT proud. For any queries, feel free to contact us.

--

Dear Participants,
Congratulations to one and all participated in the Idea Show 3.0 (In it to
win it) held on 15 october 2024.

We are thankful to all the contributors and the students for the active
participation. Here with this email I have attached all the certificates
google link (Only present students) and the below are the winner and runner
ups of the competition. Refer Excel sheet first attached herewith and then
download the certificate accordingly.

(Send me personal email for any correction in the certificate or not
received the certificate)

1. 22IT141 - Sharadkumar Savaliya and Group (Winner)
2. 23MSIT059 - Deep Shah (1st Runner up)
3. 20BPT011 - Kush Nariyani and Group (2nd Runner up)

<https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/folders/1A_xJX3AWsRSUdlqpD1GQoa60SB-Mr_Ju>

Thank you and wish you all the best.

subject: Fwd: Announcement of Maker Fest Vadodara 2025
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Dr. RV Upadhyay <rvu.as@charusat.ac.in> Date: Thu, Oct 17, 2024 at 1:57 PM Subject: Fwd: Announcement of Maker Fest Vadodara 2025 To: Teaching Staff
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Dr. R V Upadhyay <rvu.as@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, Oct 17, 2024 at 1:57‚ÄØPM
Subject: Fwd: Announcement of Maker Fest Vadodara 2025
To: Teaching Staff <teachingstaff@charusat.ac.in>



Professor R V Upadhyay
Provost,
Charotar University of Science & Technology, CHARUSAT Campus,
Changa-388 421, Dist. Anand, Gujarat, India.
e-mail: provost@charusat.ac.in <dean.research@charusat.ac.in>,
rvu.as@charusat.ac.in
Phone: +91-2697-265015,   M.  09427215242
ORCID id: 0000-0001-7309-3269

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: HT Patel <htpatel@yuvalay.org>
Date: Thu, Oct 17, 2024 at 10:47‚ÄØAM
Subject: Announcement of Maker Fest Vadodara 2025
To: Trushit Upadhyaya <trushitupadhyaya.ec@charusat.ac.in>, Manan Raval <
mananraval.ph@charusat.ac.in>, Principal ARIP CHARUSAT <
principal.arip@charusat.ac.in>, Principal PDPIAS CHARUSAT <
principal.pdpias@charusat.ac.in>, Ashwin Makwana <
ashwinmakwana.ce@charusat.ac.in>, <swatijoshi@civf.co.in>
Cc: Dr. R V Upadhyay <rvu.as@charusat.ac.in>, Registrar CHARUSAT <
registrar@charusat.ac.in>, Ashok Patel <arpatel.adm@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Sirs,

We‚Äôre thrilled to announce the 7th edition of *Maker Fest Vadodara!* The
event is scheduled for *February 1st and 2nd (Sat-Sun), 2025.*

Innovation is the key to shaping the future, and *Maker Fest Vadodara* is
the ultimate platform for students to showcase their groundbreaking ideas.
Whether they‚Äôre solving real-world problems or creating something entirely
new, this is their chance to be at the forefront of change.

In the past six editions, we‚Äôve seen incredible participation - over 1500
registrations, 360 Maker Teams exhibited, prize amount of Rs10.75 lakhs
distributed and welcomed over 47,000 visitors.

*We invite your students to be a part of this movement* ‚Äì as *Makers*. If
they‚Äôre working on something original and useful, this is their moment to
shine, network with industry leaders, and gain valuable exposure.

*Event Details:*

   - *Dates:* February 1st & 2nd, 2025 (Saturday-Sunday)
   - *Venue:* Grounds of Faculty of Technology, MSU

Registrations will open soon at: www.makerfestvadodara.com.

Encourage your students to gear up and submit their best projects.

Let‚Äôs make this year‚Äôs Maker Fest Vadodara the best one yet!
Regards,
H T Patel
Managing Trustee
Yuvalay Charitable Trust
Ph no: 9974051555
www.yuvalay.org


-- 

*Dr. Kirti Makwana*

Mobile:+91-9586861680

*[image: Inline image 1]                    *
ACCREDITED WITH ‚ÄúA+‚Äù GRADE BY NAAC, GOI

--

snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Sanni <sannikapatel.phys@charusat.ac.in> Date: Wed, Oct 16, 2024 at 10:14 AM Subject: Mandatory Foundation course Quiz for All BTech Students To: <
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Sanni <sannikapatel.phys@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, Oct 16, 2024 at 10:14‚ÄØAM
Subject: Mandatory Foundation course Quiz for All BTech Students
To: <24cspitstudents@charusat.edu.in>, Bhavika Patel <
bhavikapatel.dce@charusat.ac.in>, Dipak Ramoliya <
dipakramoliya.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Ritika Jani <ritikajani.dit@charusat.ac.in
>
Cc: Head Electrical CHARUSAT <hod.ee@charusat.ac.in>, Dean FTE CHARUSAT <
dean.fte@charusat.ac.in>, Head Mechanical CHARUSAT <hod.me@charusat.ac.in>,
Head Physics <head.physics@charusat.ac.in>, Head Maths <
head.maths@charusat.ac.in>, Pratik Pataniya <
pratikpataniya.phys@charusat.ac.in>, Sachin Patel <
sachinpatel.phys@charusat.ac.in>, Dr. Rajesh V. Savalia <
rajeshsavalia.maths@charusat.ac.in>


Dear Students,

*About Foundation Course: *
Foundation Course in Math and Physics, which is a *mandatory audit course*
for all *1st semester BTech students*. This course is designed to bridge
the gap between high school and university-level concepts, focusing on
fundamental topics such as calculus, algebra, mechanics, electromagnetism,
etc. The aim is to build a strong foundation for your advanced engineering
studies.


*Course Evaluation:*>> Internal Online Quiz: 25 Marks *(Date: 19/10/2024 |
3:00 PM to 3:30 PM) (Link will be provided before 05 mins of the quiz time)*
>> External Online Quiz: 25 Marks *(to be announced later with the external
theory exam)*
>> Total: *50 Marks*
>> Both quizzes will be conducted *online (Google Forms)*.
>> Questions in both quizzes will be asked from the question banks attached
with this email.


*Important Note:*
*1) No excuse for internet connectivity, device failure, etc will be
entertained. If you failed to attend the quiz then you shall be marked
absent.*
*2) This is a separate course that has to do nothing with your
ongoing Engineering Physics and Engineering Mathematics courses.*

*Attachments*
1) Syllabus of Foundation Course
2) Question Bank of Physics and Mathematics

For any queries, please feel free to reach out.

Best regards,
Sanni
-- 
*Thanks,*



*Sanni, Ph.D.Assistant professorDepartment of Physical Sciences
<https://www.charusat.ac.in/PDPIAS/people/>Faculty of Applied SciencesP D

subject: Re: Promoting a Continuous Learning Environment: Clubs Management | Technical Club
snippet: Dear all, In our pursuit of fostering a vibrant learning culture, Clubs Management | Technical Club is excited to introduce the "Introduction to Dart Programming" initiative. We believe that
content:
Dear all,



In our pursuit of fostering a vibrant learning culture, Clubs Management |
Technical Club is excited to introduce the  *"Introduction
to Dart Programming" *initiative. We believe that education extends beyond
the classroom and that collaborative learning can thrive even after formal
college hours.

In this context, we are organizing a webinar on  *"Introduction
to Dart Programming". * This session will be delivered by *Mr. Pravin Jadav*
.

*Webinar Details:*

   - *Date:* 22nd October,2024
   - *Time:* 7:00 PM to 8:00 PM
   - *Mode:* Online (MS Teams - The joining link will be sent to registered
   participants only.)

*Registration Process:*

To attend this insightful session, please click the link below to register:

¬∑       Registration link:
*https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScfLdm71d0Y3Vm7IpyNf9MzDYo5AS83Um8jiuMBj3yKwIpUJw/viewform?usp=sf_link
<https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScfLdm71d0Y3Vm7IpyNf9MzDYo5AS83Um8jiuMBj3yKwIpUJw/viewform?usp=sf_link>*

¬∑       Registration Deadline: 20th , October 2024

It‚Äôs a fantastic opportunity to expand your technical knowledge and explore
the future of digital trust.

For any queries, please feel free to contact Mr. Arpit Bhatt (Email id:
arpitbhatt.dcs@charusat.ac.in | Contact: 8200247217).

We look forward to your active participation!


[image: WhatsApp Image 2024-10-16 at 9.36.16 AM.jpeg]

>> can be decided by the speaker
>>

>> Dear all,
>>
>>
>>
>> In our pursuit of fostering a vibrant learning culture, Clubs Management
>> | Technical Club is excited to introduce the "*Learn After College Hours*"
>> initiative. We believe that education extends beyond the classroom and that
>> collaborative learning can thrive even after formal college hours.
>>
>> In this context, we are organizing a webinar on *"Blockchain
>> Foundations: The Core of Trustless Technology"*. This session will be
>> delivered by *Ms. Naina Parmar*
>>
>>
>>
>> *Webinar Details:*
>>
>>    - *Date:* 25th September,2024
>>    - *Time:* 8:00 PM to 9:00 PM
>>    - *Mode:* Online (MS Teams - The joining link will be sent to
>>    registered participants only.)
>>
>> *Why Attend?*
>>
>> Blockchain technology is reshaping industries by enabling secure,
>> decentralized, and transparent systems. Through this session, you will:
>>
>>    - Understand the core principles of blockchain and its architecture.
>>    - Explore the concept of a *trustless system* and how blockchain
>>    ensures security without intermediaries.
>>    - Learn about the real-world applications of blockchain in various
>>    sectors like finance, healthcare, and supply chain.
>>    - Get insights into future career opportunities in the blockchain
>>    domain.
>>
>>  *Registration Process:*
>>
>> To attend this insightful session, please click the link below to
>> register:
>>
>> ¬∑       Registration link: https://forms.gle/LfTufATSkW11wUGK6
>>
>> ¬∑       Registration Deadline: 23rd , September 2024
>>
>> It‚Äôs a fantastic opportunity to expand your technical knowledge and
>> explore the future of digital trust.
>>
>> For any queries, please feel free to contact Ms. Dipika Damodar (Email
>> id: dipikadamodar.dit@charusat.ac.in | Contact: 7405862155).
>>
>> We look forward to your active participation!
>>
>>
>> --
>> Best Regards,
>> Clubs Management | Technical Club
>>
>>
>>
>>
>> --
>> Regards:
>> Dr Dweepna Garg
>> Head Of Department & Assistant Professor
>> Department of Computer Engineering
>> Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR)
>> Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)

>>

subject: Internship Program with Meta Course
snippet: Dear Students, Greetings from MetaCourse! We are excited to announce the final opportunity to enroll in our exclusive Training and Internship Program, designed to give you hands-on industrial knowledge
content:
*Dear Students,*

*Greetings from MetaCourse!*

We are excited to announce the final opportunity to enroll in our exclusive
Training and Internship Program, designed to give you hands-on industrial
knowledge and practical skills.

*About MetaCourse:*

MetaCourse is one of the leading platforms dedicated to equipping students
with real-world skills through top-notch training and internships. We focus
on bridging the gap between academia and the industry, ensuring you are
job-ready with the latest trends and tools.

*Program Overview:*

‚úÖ *Training Program: *
Gain in-depth industrial knowledge with expert guidance. Complete the
program to unlock the opportunity for an internship.

*‚úÖ Internship Period:*
Upon completing the training, students will be doing an internship with
MetaCourse, where they can further enhance their skills and gain practical
experience.

*‚úÖ Stipend Range: *
Internship stipends range from *‚Çπ25,000 to ‚Çπ40,000, *depending on your
performance during the training & Internship phase.


*How to Apply:*

1. *Step 1: *Fill out the Google Form to apply for the internship program:

*Google form:* https://forms.gle/QBrerbMaApDCRdsH7

2. *Step 2:* Join the WhatsApp group for updates and further

https://chat.whatsapp.com/E467FtYD67eGzL3auQWutp

*Post-Completion Benefits:*

*- üìú Program Completion Certificate  *
*- üèÖ Co-Branded Internship Certificate*
*- üìù Letter of Recommendation*
*- üåê Access to MetaCourse‚Äôs Exclusive Growth Community*


*Why MetaCourse?*

- Learn from experienced professionals in your field.
- Enhance your employability with real-time project experience.
- Join a network of like-minded individuals and industry experts.

If you are ready to take your skills to the next level, act now before it's
too late!



*Thanks & Regards,*
*The MetaCourse Team*

subject: Announcement of ULSC Logo Competition Winner
snippet: Dear Students and Faculty, We are excited to announce the winner of the ULSC Logo Competition! After careful consideration and review of all the creative submissions, we are pleased to congratulate
content:
Dear Students and Faculty,

We are excited to announce the winner of the ULSC Logo Competition!

After careful consideration and review of all the creative submissions, we
are pleased to congratulate *Satyam Charola (ID: 22CE016)* as the winner of
this competition. His design will represent the ULSC, and we appreciate the
effort and creativity he put into the logo.

Satyam was awarded with a cash prize for his achievement.

We extend our heartfelt thanks to all participants for their outstanding
contributions and enthusiasm. Stay tuned for more such opportunities!

Best regards,

*Convener*


*University Level Central Students Council*

*CHARUSAT.*

--

will be held for all BTech students. The quiz will cover key topics from
your syllabus and is essential for your continuous evaluation.

Syllabus: Experiments 1 to 5 (Basic concepts, Experimental Process, etc)
Date: 19/10/2024
Time: 4:00 PM to 4:30 PM
Venue: Online (Google Form) (Link will be provided before 5 mins of Exam)
Format: Multiple-choice questions (MCQs)

Please ensure your participation as this is a compulsory part of the
assessment process. No excuses for internet connectivity, technical issues
with devices, etc. will be entertained. No marks will be given if fail to
attend this quiz.

For any further information, feel free to reach out by replying to this
email.

Best regards,

Dear Students,

This is to inform you that a mandatory quiz -1 on Engineering Physics - 1
will be held for all BTech students. The quiz will cover key topics from
your syllabus and is essential for your continuous evaluation.

*Quiz Details:*
Quiz 1
Syllabus: Experiments 1 to 5 (Basic concepts, Experimental Process, etc)
Date: 19/10/2024
Time: 4:00 PM to 4:30 PM
Venue: Online (Google Form) (Link will be provided before 5 mins of Exam)
Format: Multiple-choice questions (MCQs)

Please ensure your participation as this is a compulsory part of the
assessment process. No excuses for internet connectivity, technical issues
with devices, etc. will be entertained. No marks will be given if fail to
attend this quiz.

For any further information, feel free to reach out by replying to this
email.

Best regards,
Sanni

--
