From: AICTE(no-reply) <noreply1@aicte-india.org>
Date: Mon, Oct 14, 2024 at 5:42‚ÄØPM
Subject: Urgent: Encouragement for Student Participation in Yuva Sangam
Phase-5.
To: <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


*Gentle Reminder!*

Dear Vice Chancellor/Director/Principal/ Dean,
Greetings from AICTE!

As you know, Yuva Sangam is a key initiative under the Ek Bharat Shreshtha
Bharat (EBSB) program, launched by the Hon'ble Prime Minister of India.
This flagship program facilitates exposure tours for youth primarily
students from Higher Educational Institutions (HEIs) to experience diverse
cultures and achievements across different states. Through these exchanges,
we aim to foster national integration and understanding among young people.

Yuva Sangam not only emphasizes cultural exchange but also includes
activities designed to enhance leadership, sports, and soft skills.
Participants will engage in workshops on communication and teamwork, take
part in sports events organized by SAI, and have the chance to interact
with VVIPs and notable personalities from the host state.

The success of previous Yuva Sangam phases underscores the vital role of
youth in building connections across communities. This initiative has
positively impacted the lives of thousands, contributing to a more united
and inclusive India.

I encourage you to motivate your students to register for Yuva Sangam
Phase-5, an enriching student exchange program under EBSB.

Registration is open from *October 10, 2024* to *October 21, 2024* and can
be completed online at https://ebsb.aicte-india.org/.

Please find attached a document with strategies to inspire student
registrations for Yuva Sangam.

Thank you for your support.

PFA:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/185HEA2xFC-E7F_m5B2ltwDzMUkeHmx52/view?usp=sharing


PFA:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/17xAJKN_yZcXZ4Q2ZyN-XDgba3JeuA1JL/view?usp=sharing


PFA:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1uTQIiAiaeBZ19EvRBtyKXhNsSAqkynme/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=117518947182740027481&rtpof=true&sd=true


*Best regards,*
*Naresh Grover*

*Director (Nodal Officer, Yuva Sangam)AICTE*


-- 

*Dr. Kirti Makwana*

Mobile:+91-9586861680

*[image: Inline image 1]                    *
ACCREDITED WITH ‚ÄúA+‚Äù GRADE BY NAAC, GOI

To: Principal Depstar <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Respected Sir/Ma'am,

Are your students ready to take the leap into the future of technology? The *XR
Creator Hackathon <https://forms.gle/3A9XmiQbcx76LUaU6>* is not just
another competition; it's a* gateway to innovation*,* recognition, and
real-world experience* in the thriving field of Extended Reality (XR)! We
invite your esteemed institution to be a part of this transformative
challenge, proudly presented under the *"Create in India" initiative* at
the *WAVES Summit (World Audio Visual & Entertainment Summit)
<https://bharatxr-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com/2HUCq26MeJMXJl19DnlBbBTm4nTkC-suE3F0hrbhjN2T-QPRskgFkwyYJWufNamnf0QSX7g0kUmTtofrVVLvT0aff-uNMtHspgOSAku0wXPTyifprWfg9wikDaY5skQus9eebkHfZdYm8BVyULyAJ6pFHqjOLyC46WB1De4_nN-FPyg>,
*in collaboration with the *Ministry of Information & Broadcasting
<https://bharatxr-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com/2nGIF5f2RutoKyLKWBBb8K00uYrAQ9RdT8VO0ghWHdPEBQfRskgFky6fDjv889b-RcvuaENJn4L5oV-JRubGRn9xj5wRmR8ThvhicikGsoN4tvvblkEd6WKiYAboODzh22Zw4cloMDCqIjfBHUKa5ZPelHvByghpbjw444S5KrUCInkw>,
Bharat XR,
<https://bharatxr-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com/28-WaDsymZgg9SRn415QBFM8wUgJf_NOXsTeJY97hOr0DQfRskgEPotDczTVFEbbDAJmkxZwGoI6SOigwzDNDK0-oEBdOENBBIsCl0l-21T4OmdRvKbfBbd9zyL0A3s-ut1X6u7jjqDP5FIO3Mj9apmbWgCqlC_8FB6E_M3VntKi7Ctk>
Wavelaps, and XDG.*

At *Bharat XR
<https://bharatxr-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com/2TqD2nVTfjJpghpWdCFL0k6jvuDrjhA-Hg20msn-mtUYGQfRskgFAr3lMXKb_7c9l7VfEMVZuVoeU-rQcucbI6ieTZ0LUbN3qRH9EVMlBe-JJf7TOv73oJ8kgA0OylM0heRwmvrfBhk2gdABl5jNjvaGGv85E5Ku8ATof-0cgFoucL5w>*,
we are passionate about leading the charge in Extended Reality technologies
in India. Our mission is to *empower and nurture the next generation of XR
talent,* and this hackathon is a direct extension of that vision. By
participating, your students have the chance to engage with the latest
AR/VR tools, gain hands-on experience, and be recognized on national and
global stages.

*What Awaits the Participants?  *

   - A prize pool of 5 lakh INR
   - Investment opportunities for their winning ideas
   - Global recognition in the XR industry
   - A fully sponsored trip to the WAVES Summit in New Delhi
   - Exclusive chances for sponsored trips to international AR/VR
   conferences

*Choose from Exciting Themes:*
Students can dive into one of five dynamic themes:

   - Healthcare, Fitness, Well-Being
   - Educational Transformation
   - Immersive Tourism
   - Digital Media & Entertainment
   - E-Commerce & Retail Transformation

*How to Register?*

   - Form to nominate yourself as the *PoC* for the hackathon:
   https://forms.gle/dhqDYnkvcBM2ySjX9
   <https://bharatxr-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com/2H2wWoZQmtvt2K0oJxqQo0zolSUAzcL-mNaMzAV4vVPUJQfRskgEylTD0KCvVrLF78i_k4Hdt7Qwnb24b_YGfHVA8s22eiCnpDEQWfiltZsJrCPIflrifqKNOAHmB8wxo6Bd4wzvWm_FKGAOBPAgEMUjCCQIPGUyg_3eVItlU78DeA5BhJaXNrt2JOcDAM_NI7Q>
   - About XR Creator Hackathon: https://wavelaps.com/xrcreatorhackathon/
   <https://bharatxr-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com/2h2Tvnvrvpj7WzNFu9yyAM6sqW4TCY9VMQhz8dn_1-BoLQfRskgFGqZisTc4I04fUt68FoOhoCmfQif8pUS9hGxb8Qla3NBaxIY1tVWWxNN-D6rtJm5bM4SoBzSlRTA1jw0a0car44YaOLbua1JnckV4tltqhCuljJJ9HZw1MVopsurK25vggRZAXJS7C8ck>
   - Encourage your students to *register individually* here, exclusively
   for the college students: https://forms.gle/3A9XmiQbcx76LUaU6
   <https://bharatxr-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com/2uNlK7ddGfMTB6yUiEqPTqJaR2L397T8Wj5jwy1-rxjEOQfRskgEo7m0K2BayFBEzyVzl8ipJGp83q5MxppZ0WxxTUeYMDZzf6lbTpdIUsCtZKX6Y_E47h8LEbqtuPjJBh0Adi88ylsrAJOQEsZSs_ipIdvj-qc-mJRx-WUv_EMYN-EgBNaP358SclcrYDoQ3YA>
   - *WAVES Summit:* https://wavesindia.org/
   <https://bharatxr-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com/2of5ReGGRIaA2zI4JTkd8nAu2BJulYoCcryXohTMcJ2MQQfRskgFgf8SWsQvuIidtHftHleZ42kl8ETMJhU2PNbGvfu7vfGFJyVofNaA38cyMRBNmquaysa8ljQM_Hud_aBCf_233GeEhxWq0-Q9bTXsFQB0Ks_5LuiyyKsVvfXNJeQ>

*Incentives for Your Institution:*
Your institution can shine brighter with our incentives:

   - *100+ registrations*: The point of contact will receive a digital
   certificate of appreciation featuring the Ministry of Information &
   Broadcasting logo.
   - *200+ registrations*: Your college's logo will be displayed on our
   official event website, enhancing your institution's visibility across the
   nation.

*Why Is This Challenge Essential?*
We urge your institution to rally your students to register before the
*deadline* on *October 15, 2024*. This remote challenge is open to all
Indian citizens and offers a platform for students to develop their skills,
innovate with cutting-edge technologies, and connect with industry
professionals.

*Support for Beginners:*
To empower every student, we are offering dedicated learning sessions for
beginners during the ideation and implementation phases. The first session
on* October 11, 2024*, will unveil the latest advancements in AR and VR. We
are also open to organizing tailored sessions for your college to ensure
students have the best possible start.

Attached is an official letter from* Mrs. Neerja Sekhar, IAS, Additional
Secretary to the Government of India, Ministry Of Information &
Broadcasting*, which provides further details about our collaboration and
the significance of this event.

By partnering with *Bharat XR* and other esteemed organizations, your
institution will play a pivotal role in shaping the future of XR in India.
Join us in inspiring the next generation of XR innovators! Your support can
be the catalyst that propels your students into an exciting future.
Together, we can foster a culture of creativity and excellence in AR/VR
technology.

Let‚Äôs make history together by shaping the future of XR technology!

Warm regards,
Chhavi Garg
<https://bharatxr-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com/2nDoN2GlGs6Kq3gresiDhlG_3s7hqoFS7IVyzwvk6ltoTQfRskgFaXVYZ_f2_sRIjl6YQp6o8HLCm6u51SAYWY3__dS01-XBd7WoFN-MFx0NNZD0_7bRzjlviWgGPOS0LB5pZ-InYZAx_PFQF2yF_SqgLWoTgiWB0LgrUeCDZ1aR5EZ_TdGVO>
Founder & CEO, Bharat XR
<https://bharatxr-dot-yamm-track.appspot.com/2-oPCcLoPBfqN7p3leYV-v5grQ9PiGQeBieN-Bfdy6wMVQfRskgF2G8KVzAcWHgrvcg7OHicUjw3s77qeps3LFwwRuGJKHQuMcFI1h36xbWDLShDJP2OkIbAFXa1a7_oJjvnbc7sdQ4_FGPlDtew-tjkhj8WCSBj__a3y0CrZp6O3bukt295l-kvw8roq>

subject: Re: Regarding Anti-ragging Registration
snippet: Dear Students, A Gentle Reminder to submit anti ragging form to your councellor by today only, ignore if you have already completed. On Fri, Sep 20, 2024, 2:59 PM Priyanka Padhiyar <priyankapadhiyar
content:
Dear Students,

A Gentle Reminder to submit anti ragging form to your councellor by today
only, ignore if you have already completed.

On Fri, Sep 20, 2024, 2:59 PM Priyanka Padhiyar <
priyankapadhiyar.dcs@charusat.ac.in> wrote:

> Dear students,
>
> Greetings...!
>
> Please find the below reminder for the anti-ragging affidavit
> registration for AY 2024-25.
> Kindly find the revised process for filing the anti-ragging affidavit.
>
> Step-1: Go to  http://www.antiragging.in/affidavit_university_form.php
>
> Step-2: Fill in the information as desired and submit the form. Read and
> confirm that you and your parents have read and understood the AICTE
> regulations
>
> Step-3: On successful completion, you will receive an email regarding the
> reference number and weblink where you will be able to check your
> registration status
>
> Step-4: Go to http://www.antiragging.in/undertaking_request.php and *generate
> an undertaking document. Take a print of it. Put your signature and your
> parent's signature and submit the hard copy of it to your respective
> faculty batch counselor. *
>
> [Reference ID can be found in your mail received from the anti-ragging
>  committee.]
>
> Step-5: Go to this Google form link
> https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1xGZr38SpdPbgzQnzhd_5AwYYn6UwI_BxOaciO3nFDZ8/edit and
> Submit Anti-Ragging Form(Signed copy of Student & Parents).
>
> *Deadline: 01/10/2024, 4:30 PM.*
>
> Here, I attached documents for your reference.
>
> *Thanks & Regards,*
> *Priyanka Padhiyar*
> *Assistant Professor,*
> *Computer Science & Engineering,*
> *Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology & Research (DEPSTAR),*
> *Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT),*
> *At. & Post Changa-388421, Ta: Petlad, Dist: Anand, (Gujarat) India. *
>
>
>

--

subject: Invitation to "The Idea Show 3.0" ‚Äì Join Us for an Exciting Innovation Challenge!
snippet: Dear Students, We are thrilled to invite you to "The Idea Show 3.0" (In It To Win It), an exciting event jointly organized by Aavishkar Club, CMPICA, and CSIC, CHARUSAT. This is your chance
content:
Dear Students,

We are thrilled to invite you to *"The Idea Show 3.0" (In It To Win It)*,
an exciting event jointly organized by *Aavishkar Club, CMPICA, and CSIC,
CHARUSAT*. This is your chance to unleash your creativity, showcase
innovative ideas, and compete with like-minded peers in the fields of
*Automation,
Artificial Intelligence, and Healthcare*!

*Event Details: " **The Idea Show 3.0 (In It To Win It) "*

   - *Date*: 15th October 2024, Tuesday
   - *Theme*: Automation / Artificial Intelligence / Healthcare
   - *Team Size*: upto 4 Members
   - *Organizers*: Aavishkar Club, CMPICA, and CSIC, CHARUSAT
   - *Registration Link*: Click Here <https://tinyurl.com/Ideashow3>

We have also attached the *QR code* for quick access to the registration
link in the brochure.

All *participants will receive certificates*, and *winners will be awarded
exciting prizes* for their outstanding ideas.

Don‚Äôt miss this golden opportunity to present your ideas, innovate, and
win! We look forward to your participation in making this event a success.

For any further queries, please feel free to contact the organizing team.
Find the brochure attached herewith. Furthermore, the details like venue
and timings will be shared by the email after registrations.


*Best Regards,*












*Aavishkar Club Members,Dr. Shailesh Khant,Dr. Arpankumar Raval,Dr. Kamini
Solanki,Dr. Sagar KavaiyaDr. Amisha SinghalaCSIC, Charusat,Dr. Jaimin
Undavia,Dr. Shailesh Khant,Dr. Kamini Solanki,Dr. Mittal Desai,*





-- 

*Nilesh Kumar Dubey**(PhD)*
Assistant Professor,
Computer Science and Engineering,
Institutional Coordinator of *IQAC*, *CSIC,* *UIIC, IPR*
Devang Patel Institute of Advanced Technology & Research

Changa-388421, Gujarat, INDIA.

content:

Kindly consider the date *5th October 2024(Tomorrow-Saturday)* for the same.

*Thanks & Regards,*
*Bansari Patel*
*Department of Computer Science & Engineering,*
*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR),*
*Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)*


On Fri, Oct 4, 2024 at 12:38‚ÄØPM Bansari Patel <
bansaripatel.dcs@charusat.ac.in> wrote:

> Dear Students,
>
> We are pleased to inform you about a *workshop on GitHub for Beginners,*
> scheduled on *5th September 2024*. All First-Year students are requested
> to attend the workshop without fail. This workshop will cover the basics of
> GitHub, an essential tool for version control and collaboration in software
> development.
>
>
> *Workshop Details:*
>
>    - Date: 5th September 2024
>    - Time: 9:00 AM onwards
>    - Venue: 329 Seminar Hall
>    - Target Audience: 1st Year (CE/CSE/IT)
>
> Please ensure your attendance, as this workshop is an important part of
> your learning journey.
>

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Head CE Depstar <hod.ceds@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, 3 Oct, 2024, 5:43‚ÄØpm
Subject: Fwd: Online Meeting regarding ABC-ID for First Year(2024 admitted)
students
To: Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Nirav Bhatt <niravbhatt.it@charusat.ac.in>, Principal DEPSTAR <
principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Dear first year class coordinators,

Please circulate among our students too and guide them accordingly.

In case of any queries, details of query-solving meeting is also mentioned.

Please ensure all our 2024 admitted batch students must have ABC-ID.

Thank you


---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Nirav Bhatt <niravbhatt.it@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, 3 Oct, 2024, 5:37‚ÄØpm
Subject: Online Meeting regarding ABC-ID for First Year(2024 admitted)
students
To: <24cspitstudents@charusat.edu.in>
Cc: Dean FTE CHARUSAT <dean.fte@charusat.ac.in>, Principal C.S.Patel
Institute of Technology <principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in>, Principal DEPSTAR
<principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>, HOD Depstar <hodds@charusat.ac.in>, HOD
Group <hod@charusat.ac.in>


Dear CHARUSAT Students,

You might know that the Government of India has initiated *National
Education Policy 2020 (NEP-2020)*. One of the important points under the
policy, applicable to higher education, is to provide a  *CREDIT transfer
facility* through *ABC-ID*(Academic Bank of Credits-ID).

In line with the above-mentioned subject, you all are requested to *create
the ABC-ID* (IF you havn't created yet) from the below-given website. The
details of the need for ABC-ID and its benefits are mentioned in the
presentation as available in the link below. please go through the
presentation for a detailed understanding of the same.

*Kindly find the attachment regarding different ways to create ABC-ID.*

*Link of ABC-ID Presentation manual*:
https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1vokIiR3YRPeU_4qNAxa3cosi9lHFewm5HBUxfJA-IQw/preview?slide=
id.p
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*Regarding ABC ID*
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Steps to create ABC id is:

step-1: create abc id from: https://www.abc.gov.in/
step-2: Select student as shown below:

[image: image.png]

*The online meeting to solve doubts/queries (If any) regarding the ABC-ID
is scheduled as per below:*

Date:  07/10/2024, Monday
Time: 11.10 am
Meeting Link: Meeting link will be shared soon [Microsoft Team]




-- 
*Regards,*

*Nirav Bhatt*

--

convener.eoc@charusat.ac.in>, <23ce022@charusat.edu.in>, <
23ce115@charusat.edu.in>, CEdept <ce@charusat.ac.in>


Dear All,



U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering, CSPIT organizes
following Event in step towards helping people having disabilities or
Physically Challenged.



*Title of the Event:* " CREATIVE PROJECT IDEAS FOR IMPROVING THE LIVES OF
SPECIALLY ABLED PEOPLE "



Guidelines:



1.    Students may submit their creative working project ideas on
a drawing sheet of paper/PPT/PDF.


Submission Link: https://forms.gle/GUHRx6sLvhYPatmx7


These can be further modified on the day of presentation [*7/12/2024*].

2.    Last *Extended Date* of Entry Submission: 30th November, 2024 [Ideas
through online shared google form]. Each student has to make a separate
entry using the shared google form link.

3.    Students may use a pen, pencil, sketch pens or any other tools
[Computer Software/Hardware] to depict their ideas on the day of
presentation [Date: 7/12/2024, Venue: MAC LAB (601), A7 Building].
Participants have to remain present in MAC LAB (601) [A7 Building]
from 09:15 am to 12:00 pm on 07/12/2024, Saturday to present their
project ideas.
Students may use presentation and poster to demonstrate their project ideas.

4.    Students may show Project Implementation

5.    Students may submit their ideas in a group of maximum 3 students.

6.    Best of the THREE Innovative Ideas will be awarded prize money &
certificate *(First prize 1500 Rs/-, Second Prize 1000 Rs/-, Third Prize
500 Rs/-)*. Others will receive a certificate of participation.



*EOC Department Coordinators are requested to encourage students for
participation and please forward this mail to students of your department.*


*For any further query you may please contact student coordinators (**23CE022
- Devam Bhaveshbhai Ghodasara *and *23CE115 - Priya Babubhai Pedhadiya* *).*

Dhaval Bhoi
Assistant Professor,
U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering,
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT, Changa.
Ta-Petlad Dist.Anand
PIN-388421 GUJARAT, INDIA

subject: Fwd: Student Achievement Records
snippet: Dear Students, Greetings!!! Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR) always believes that Achievements (Academics)/Co-curricular Activities & Extra Co-curricular
content:
Dear Students,

Greetings!!!

Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR) always
believes that *Achievements (Academics)/Co-curricular Activities & Extra
Co-curricular Activities/Competitive Exams* are equally important for the
holistic development of students.

We always encourage students to take participation in various activities
which are listed below:

1. *Technical *(hackathon/coding competition/web development
competition/robot fight)
*2*. *Non-Technical* (poster presentation/paper presentation/debate)
*3*. *Cultural* (dance/singing/rangoli/mehndi/music
competition/crafting/painting)
4. *Sports* (indoor games/outdoor games)
*5*. *Competitive Exams*

You all are requested to enter the details of your achievement in the
below-mentioned link.


*Note :*
1. Duration you need to consider for entering the details of
your achievement:  *1/5/2024 to 01/10/2024*
2. This form accepts only *PDF* File.

Link: *https://forms.gle/1Ce84RQrNx7ru6uC6*
<https://forms.gle/1Ce84RQrNx7ru6uC6>
-- 
Thanks & Regards,
Aishwariya Budhrani
Assistant Professor,
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology and Research (DEPSTAR),
Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT)

--

Scholarship schemes (Degree & Diploma) 2024-25 through National Scholarship
Portal (NSP)- Reg.
To: <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Having trouble reading this email? View it in your mobile/ web browser
<https://jan-sampark.nic.in/campaigns/2024/26-Sep/AICTE1/index.html>
------------------------------

*Dear Principal/Director,*

It is informed that the last date for the submission of online applications
form (Degree & Diploma) under AICTE Pragati Scholarship Scheme (for girl
students), AICTE Saksham Scholarship Scheme (for specially-abled students)
and AICTE Swanath Scholarship Scheme 2024-25 has been opened through
National Scholarship Portal (NSP) till 31st October 2024.

It is further requested that to avail the benefits of scholarship schemes,
students should ensure to submit their registration and renewal application
on time.

Copy of the notification of NSP is enclosed for further information please.

subject: Fwd: DCS Internal Marks and Answer Sheet Checking Schedule MSUD101
snippet: Dear Students, I am attaching the internal marks here. Please note the schedule for the answer sheet checking for your understanding. It is not mandatory to check your answer sheet, but the schedule is
content:
Dear Students,

I am attaching the internal marks here. Please note the schedule for the
answer sheet checking for your understanding. It is not mandatory to check
your answer sheet, but the schedule is as follows:

- *For students not staying in the hostel*:  You may come tomorrow from *3:20
PM to 4:20 PM*.

- *For hostel students*:  You may come this Saturday from *12:30 PM to 2:00
PM*.

Please note that only one student can check their answer book at a time, so
there is a time constraint, and the schedule will be followed strictly.

*Additionally, after the checking period, I will submit all answer books.
Therefore, no queries or claims of human error will be considered.* Once
the marks are submitted, it will not be possible to change or correct them.

Feel free to contact me if you have any questions.




*Dr. Bina Patel*
*Assistant Professor*

subject: EKYC- Google Form
snippet: Dear Students, Greetings!!! E-KYC of students is required to avail the Pre-Matric and Post-Matric Scholarship Scheme of Central Govt./ State Govt. and various other scholarship schemes as well. In this
content:
Dear Students,


Greetings!!!


 E-KYC of students is required to avail the Pre-Matric and Post-Matric
Scholarship Scheme of Central Govt./ State Govt. and various other scholarship
schemes as well.


In this regard, kindly note that the  E-KYC can be done through the
following means :


*1) Through My Ration mobile app, the beneficiary can do face
authentication at home.*



*2) Through web based through VCE in e-Gram Center at Gram Panchayat and*


*3) PDS+ can
be done through mobile app by Officer/Staff/ VCE/ Principal/Teachers .*


*The work of E-KYC has to be completed within 3 Days which every student
should note.*


*Important Note:*

*After doing E-KYC, it is mandatory to fill the Google form mentioned
below.*

*https://forms.gle/ZXDKwh2Nm77rXLmq7 <https://forms.gle/ZXDKwh2Nm77rXLmq7>*


*Thanks and Regards,*
*RADHIKA H. PATEL*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Information Technology*
*DEPSTAR,*
*CHARUSAT, Changa*

--

subject: Fwd: Postponement of the celebration of Vrund '24 to Monday - September 30, 2024
snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Convener ECC <convener.ecc@charusat.ac.in> Date: Fri, Sep 27, 2024 at 12:23 PM Subject: Postponement of the celebration of Vrund '24 to Monday -
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Convener ECC <convener.ecc@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Fri, Sep 27, 2024 at 12:23‚ÄØPM
Subject: Postponement of the celebration of Vrund '24 to Monday - September
30, 2024
To: Charusat Family <charusatfamily@charusat.ac.in>


Dear All,

Please note that looking at the weather forecasts and safety - security of
the students particularly those commuting, celebration of Vrund '24 has
been postponed to September 30, 2024.

All other details and schedule for Vrund '24 remain intact for Monday -
September 30, 2024.

Please inform the staff, students and invitees of your Department /
Institute / Family accordingly.

Inconvenience is highly regretted.

Thanking you in anticipation of your cooperation,

With regards,

Team ULSC


-- 

*Dr. Kirti Makwana*

Mobile:+91-9586861680

*[image: Inline image 1]                    *
ACCREDITED WITH ‚ÄúA+‚Äù GRADE BY NAAC, GOI

subject: Blood Donation Camp on 30/09/2024
snippet: Dear CHARUSAT Family, We hope this message finds you well. We are excited to announce a special event that can make a significant impact on the lives of others in our community. CHRF and NSS units of
content:
*Dear CHARUSAT Family,*

We hope this message finds you well. We are excited to announce a special
event that can make a significant impact on the lives of others in our
community. CHRF and NSS units of CHARUSAT, BDIPS, ARIP and MTIN
have organized a Blood donation camp in collaboration with the Lions Club
of Nadiad Mains, and Indian Red Cross Society. We invite each one of you to
participate and contribute to this noble cause.

Blood Donation Camp details are as under:



*Date: 30/09/2024*

*Time: 09:30 am to 3:30 pm*

*Location: Physiotherapy Department, Ground floor, CHRF, CHARUSAT *



Let's come together as a university community and make
this Blood Donation Camp a resounding success. Your contribution can truly
make a life-saving difference.

If you have any questions or need further information, please feel free to
contact the NSS Department.

Thank you for your willingness to participate, we are looking forward to
seeing you at the Blood Donation Camp!

Link for registration into Blood Donation Camp: *(Fill this out on or
before 27/09/2024)*


https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd_asjz8lC4zZHjVyxqu8PSZdZhPSnsSu0RJpj7wDmdhFlEzg/viewform?usp=sf_link



*Kishan Patel*

*NSS Program Coordinator *

*Charusat NSS Cell*

--

subject: Re: Promoting a Continuous Learning Environment: Clubs Management | Technical Club
snippet: Dear Students, Thank you for attending our webinar on "Blockchain Foundations: The Core of Trustless Technology" with Ms. Naina Parmar. We hope you found the session insightful and
content:
Dear Students,

Thank you for attending our webinar on *"Blockchain Foundations: The Core
of Trustless Technology"* with *Ms. Naina Parmar*. We hope you found the
session insightful and informative.

To help us improve and serve you better in future events, we kindly ask you
to take a few minutes to fill out a short feedback form. Your opinions and
suggestions are valuable to us.

*Feedback Form link:*

https://docs.google.com/forms/u/1/d/e/1FAIpQLSdQH4N4ys7e2q23Lw_25tfCxt7mbOtns4vm99yQZNxoFhnKkA/viewform?usp=send_form

We appreciate your time and look forward to hearing your thoughts!

Thank you once again for your participation and support.

Best regards,

Club Management |Technical Club

Dear All,



U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering, CSPIT organizes
following Event in step towards helping people having disabilities or
Physically Challenged.



*Title of the Event:* " CREATIVE PROJECT IDEAS FOR IMPROVING THE LIVES OF
SPECIALLY ABLED PEOPLE "



Guidelines:



1.    Students may submit their creative working project ideas on
a drawing sheet of paper/PPT/PDF.


Submission Link: https://forms.gle/GUHRx6sLvhYPatmx7


These can be further modified on the day of presentation [*05/10/2024*].

2.    Last Date of Entry Submission: 2nd October, 2024 [Ideas through
online shared google form]. Each student has to make a separate entry using
the shared google form link.

3.    Students may use a pen, pencil, sketch pens or any other tools
[Computer Software/Hardware] to depict their ideas on the day of
presentation [Date: 05/10/2024, Venue: MAC LAB (601), A7 Building].
Participants have to remain present in MAC LAB (601) [A7 Building]
from 09:15 am to 12:00 pm on 05/10/2024, Saturday to present their
project ideas.
Students may use presentation and poster to demonstrate
their project ideas.

4.    Students may show Project Implementation

5.    Students may submit their ideas in a group of maximum 3 students.

6.    Best of the THREE Innovative Ideas will be awarded prize money &
certificate *(First prize 1500 Rs/-, Second Prize 1000 Rs/-, Third Prize
500 Rs/-)*. Others will receive a certificate of participation.



*EOC Department Coordinators are requested to encourage students for
participation.*


*For any further query you may please contact student coordinators (**23CE022
- Devam Bhaveshbhai Ghodasara *and *23CE115 - Priya Babubhai Pedhadiya* *).*



Dhaval Bhoi
Assistant Professor,
U & P U. Patel Department of Computer Engineering,
Chandubhai S Patel Institute of Technology,
CHARUSAT, Changa.
Ta-Petlad Dist.Anand
PIN-388421 GUJARAT, INDIA


-- 

*Dr. Kirti Makwana*

Mobile:+91-9586861680

Dear CHARUSAT Family Members,

We are pleased to announce that a Poster Presentation Competition on
'Assistive Technology' will be held on October 5, 2024 during 10.00 am to
2.30 pm. This event is jointly organized by Equal Opportunity Cell (EOC),
CHARUSAT and  Badhir Vidhyalaya Deaf, Nadiad.

The event encourages to put forward your creative and innovative ideas for
assistive technology helping the disabled/Specially abled persons. This is
an excellent opportunity to showcase your creativity for the benefit of
society through poster presentation.

You are requested to encourage your students to participate individually or
in a group. Maximum of 5 participants are allowed per group.

Register yourself or your group by clicking on the following link or
scanning the QR code (Given in Brochure) on or before October 1, 2024.


https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfIpTsI0TiHxTOI7Nff6-Tk2TJ_G5i7jVckleWXdTs7COfb2w/viewform?usp=pp_url


For more details, please refer to the attached brochure.

For any further details, please contact

Mr. Jivanadhar Joshi (M: 9099896476)

Dr. V. R. Panchal

subject: Regarding Anti-ragging Registration
snippet: Dear students, Greetings...! Please find the below reminder for the anti-ragging affidavit registration for AY 2024-25. Kindly find the revised process for filing the anti-ragging affidavit. Step-1: Go
content:
Dear students,

Greetings...!

Please find the below reminder for the anti-ragging affidavit registration
for AY 2024-25.
Kindly find the revised process for filing the anti-ragging affidavit.

Step-1: Go to  http://www.antiragging.in/affidavit_university_form.php

Step-2: Fill in the information as desired and submit the form. Read and
confirm that you and your parents have read and understood the AICTE
regulations

Step-3: On successful completion, you will receive an email regarding the
reference number and weblink where you will be able to check your
registration status

Step-4: Go to http://www.antiragging.in/undertaking_request.php and *generate
an undertaking document. Take a print of it. Put your signature and your
parent's signature and submit the hard copy of it to your respective
faculty batch counselor. *

[Reference ID can be found in your mail received from the anti-ragging
 committee.]

Step-5: Go to this Google form link
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1xGZr38SpdPbgzQnzhd_5AwYYn6UwI_BxOaciO3nFDZ8/edit
and
Submit Anti-Ragging Form(Signed copy of Student & Parents).

*Deadline: 01/10/2024, 4:30 PM.*

Here, I attached documents for your reference.

*Thanks & Regards,*
*Priyanka Padhiyar*
*Assistant Professor,*
*Computer Science & Engineering,*
*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology & Research (DEPSTAR),*
*Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT),*
*At. & Post Changa-388421, Ta: Petlad, Dist: Anand, (Gujarat) India. *

--

subject: Reg. Seating Arrangement for Internal Exam - 1 of 1st Semester - A.Y. 2024-25.
snippet: Dear Students, Greetings!!! Please find attached herewith the seating arrangement of Internal Exam 1 commencing from 23.09.2024. Students are required to adhere to the seating arrangement outlined in
content:
Dear Students,

Greetings!!!

Please find attached herewith the* seating arrangement of Internal Exam 1
commencing from 23.09.2024.*


   - Students are required to adhere to the seating arrangement outlined in
   the email attachment.
   - Students are required to uphold decorum in the examination location.
   - Mobile phones, smartwatches, or any other electronic devices are
   strictly prohibited within the exam hall.
   - Bags must be left outside, and it is mandatory to wear an ID card.
   - Students have to take their seats in the exam hall at least 15
   minutes before the exam time.

*The exam will take place in the CMPICA Building.*
*Thanks and Regards,*
*RADHIKA H. PATEL*
*Assistant Professor*
*Department of Information Technology*
*DEPSTAR,*
*CHARUSAT, Changa*

subject: Fwd: Expert Session on "Navigating New Beginnings: Bridging Life, Learning, Evaluation & Transition".
snippet: Dear All, Greetings!!! It gives us immense pleasure to announce that the Counselling Team of Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology & Research (DEPSTAR) has organized an expert talk on "
content:
Dear All,

Greetings!!!

It gives us immense pleasure to announce that the Counselling Team of
Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology & Research (DEPSTAR) has
organized  an expert talk on "Navigating New Beginnings: Bridging Life,
Learning, Evaluation & Transition" by  Dr. Heena Rachh.

This talk is organized to explore the principles of change management,
managing transitions, life beyond school, and integrating life objectives
into curriculum design for holistic student development.

It is mandatory for the students of first year CE, CSE and IT to attend it.

The schedule is as follows:
*Day and Date*: Friday - September 20, 2024
*Time*: 09:30 AM to 11:30 AM
*Location*: PDPIAS Auditorium
*Expert Name*: Dr. Heena Rachh
*Designation*: Passionate Educator and Thought Leader
*Affiliation of expert*: Founder & Director of Dr. Heena's Finishing School

For any queries, please feel free to contact Ms. Kinjal Gandhi and Ms.
Shital Sharma.
For your reference, a brochure is attached herewith.



-- 
*Thanks & Regards,*
*KINJAL GANDHI*
*Assistant Professor,*
*Department of Computer Engineering,*
*Devang Patel Institute of Advance Technology & Research (DEPSTAR),*
*Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT),*
*At. & Post Changa-388421, Ta: Petlad, Dist: Anand, (Gujarat) India.*


-- 
*Dipak Ramoliya** /Assistant Professor,*
Department of Computer Science & Engineering, DEPSTAR,
Charotar University of Science & Technology(CHARUSAT)- Changa,
Email: dipakramoliya.ce@charusat.ac.in,
Mo. +91 99987 71587

*Accredited Grade ‚ÄúA+‚Äù by NAAC, GOI*

--

snippet: ---------- Forwarded message --------- From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in> Date: Thu, Sep 19, 2024 at 12:51 PM Subject: Fwd: Logo Design Contest for SHAPHARI Certification
content:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, Sep 19, 2024 at 12:51‚ÄØPM
Subject: Fwd: Logo Design Contest for SHAPHARI Certification Scheme ‚Äì reg.
To: Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>




---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: CHARUSAT <info@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Thu, Sep 19, 2024 at 11:36‚ÄØAM
Subject: Fwd: Logo Design Contest for SHAPHARI Certification Scheme ‚Äì reg.
To: Principal <principal@charusat.ac.in>




---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: AQUA MPEDA <aqua@mpeda.gov.in>
Date: Thu, Sep 19, 2024 at 11:30‚ÄØAM
Subject: Logo Design Contest for SHAPHARI Certification Scheme ‚Äì reg.
To:


Dear Sir/Madam,


Greetings from MPEDA!


MPEDA has initiated a certification scheme called SHAPHARI for hatcheries
and aquaculture farms. ‚ÄòSHAPHARI‚Äô is a Sanskrit word meaning superior
quality fishery products suitable for human consumption. To promote
SHAPHARI certification among farmers and hatchery operators, and to raise
awareness about avoiding antibiotic abuse, MPEDA is hosting a Logo Design
Contest. The winning logo will be featured on SHAPHARI certificates, with a
prize of ‚Çπ10,000.


We encourage students to participate and submit their designs through the
link below by 03.10.2024. Please review the attached guidelines before
submission.

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe1WgYlXoPKivxOYdMnWvYhs_WweIj2as3shTTSLekDVgTh1w/viewform



Thank you,


With regards,


Neenu Peter

Deputy Director,

Aquaculture Section

Head Office

The Marine Products Export Development Authority

Govt. of India

Kochi - 36

Ph: +91 484 2311901





<https://amritmahotsav.nic.in/>



-- 

Charotar University of Science & Technology

Accorded with Centre of Excellence by Govt. of Gujarat

--

subject: DEPSTAR_CSE_Call for Nominations: Become a Gender Champion @ CHARUSAT
snippet: Dear Students, We are excited to announce an opportunity for you to become a Gender Champion at our institution. Gender Champions play a crucial role in promoting gender equality, raising awareness,
content:
Dear Students,

We are excited to announce an opportunity for you to *become a Gender
Champion at our institution. *Gender Champions play a crucial role in
promoting gender equality, raising awareness, and fostering a respectful
and inclusive environment within our campus community.

As a Gender Champion, you will have the opportunity to:

   - Engage with peers and faculty on issues related to gender equality.
   - Organize awareness programs and activities to promote gender equity.
   - Be a voice for creating an inclusive environment for all students,
   regardless of gender.

*Eligibility Criteria:*

   - Students above 16 years of age and currently enrolled in the
   institution.
   - A strong commitment to promoting gender equality.
   - Leadership qualities, excellent communication skills, and a passion
   for advocacy.

If you are interested in taking on this role and making a positive impact,
we encourage you to nominate yourself by filling out the application
form *[attached
to this email].*

The deadline for nominations is September 21, 2024.

Let's work together to create a campus where everyone feels valued and
respected!

*A letter from UGC is attached for your ready reference. *

Best regards,
--

*Dr. Kirti Makwana*

Mobile:+91-9586861680

*[image: Inline image 1]                    *

subject: Steps to access WiFi Internet on laptop and computer labs
snippet: Dear New Students... To access wifi internet, please follow under mentioned steps: 1:- open URL http://egov.charusat (Open URL within campus only) 2:- Login with your egovernance ID and Password 3:-
content:
Dear New Students...

To access wifi internet, please follow under mentioned steps:

1:-   open URL http://egov.charusat  (Open URL within campus only)
2:-   Login with your egovernance ID and Password
3:-   Top left cornet (3 horizontal bar) go to settings
4:-   Select "Internet WiFi password change"
5:-   You may set a strong password for your internet access. With the help
of your student ID and Wi-Fi password, you can access the internet from
permitted computer labs and on your laptop. (WiFI on mobile is restricted)

To access WiFi from Laptop, connect to either CHARUSAT WiFi or WINCell SSID
with password "charusat"

You may also get a better idea with the attached video.

*Best Regards*


*Ritesh Bhatt *Head Datacenter, WIN-Cell
Charotar University of Science & Technology (CHARUSAT)
Accredited *Grade 'A+'* by NAAC

At. Changa 388 421, Ta. Petlad,
Dist. Anand
O: +912697-265106 / 07

subject: Fwd: An Expert Session on "Time Management" for the students of CSPIT & DEPSTAR
snippet: Dear Students, You may register if interested and grab the opportunity to learn strategies to manage your time more effectively, enhance productivity, and achieve your goals. Thank You ----------
content:
Dear Students,

You may register if interested and grab the opportunity to learn strategies
to manage your time more effectively, enhance productivity, and achieve
your goals.

Thank You

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Principal DEPSTAR <principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, Sep 18, 2024 at 12:20‚ÄØPM
Subject: Fwd: An Expert Session on "Time Management" for the students of
CSPIT & DEPSTAR
To: Depstar <depstar@charusat.ac.in>




---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Vikas Panchal <vikaspanchal.me@charusat.ac.in>
Date: Wed, Sep 18, 2024 at 12:19‚ÄØPM
Subject: An Expert Session on "Time Management" for the students of CSPIT &
DEPSTAR
To: Head Mechanical CHARUSAT <hod.me@charusat.ac.in>, Head CE CHARUSAT <
hod.ce@charusat.ac.in>, Head Electrical CHARUSAT <hod.ee@charusat.ac.in>,
Head IT CHARUSAT <hod.it@charusat.ac.in>, Head Civil CHARUSAT <
hod.cv@charusat.ac.in>, Head EC CHARUSAT <hod.ec@charusat.ac.in>, HEAD-CSE
DPTR <headcse.dptr@charusat.ac.in>, HEAD-IT DPTR <headit.dptr@charusat.ac.in>,
Head CE Depstar <hod.ceds@charusat.ac.in>
Cc: Principal C.S.Patel Institute of Technology <
principal.cspit@charusat.ac.in>, Principal DEPSTAR <
principal.depstar@charusat.ac.in>


Dear all,

We are excited to invite you to an insightful seminar on "*Time Management"*
organised by the Club "*House of Innovation"*. This session is designed to
equip you with practical tools and strategies to manage your time more
effectively, enhance productivity, and achieve your goals.

*Seminar Details:*

*Topic:* "Time Management: Master Your Day, Master Your Life"

¬∑        *Date:* 20th September 2024 (Friday)

¬∑        *Time:* 12:00 PM ‚Äì 02.00 PM

¬∑        *Speaker:* Mr. Mann Solanki, JCI & ISTD Chapter

¬∑        *Venue: *2nd Floor Seminar Hall, EC/EE Building

¬∑        *Target Audience:* Students of FTE, CHARUSAT

In today‚Äôs fast-paced world, effective time management is a crucial skill
that can help you balance academic responsibilities, extracurricular
activities, and personal growth. This seminar will provide actionable
insights to help you optimize your time and increase efficiency.


*How to Register:*

To reserve your spot, please click on the link to register:
https://forms.gle/BrC7TjeiHABzEJAV7


Seats are limited, so be sure to register soon!

All participants will receive an *e-certificate* as a token of their
participation and engagement.

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at *+91 70166
09343/+91 9913208633 or email us at **club.houseofinnovation@gmail.com*
<club.houseofinnovation@gmail.com>*.*

We look forward to seeing you there and helping you unlock the power of
time management!


Best regards,
*Club House of Innovation*





--
